我不相信体罚有益处
to throw the book at sb
重罚某人
to make an example of sb
惩罚某人以儆戒他人
to get away with doing sth
不因做某事而受惩罚
he got off with a £50 fine
他只被罚了50英镑而已
you\'ll be for the high jump
[fig] 你将受到严厉惩罚
to punish sb for sth/for doing sth
因某事/做某事而惩罚某人

真相大白后，他得到了应有的惩罚。

chūyú wúnài

我家的锅灶只在过年的几天用，平时一直闲着。

The pot, and stove in my house are used only during Spring Festival.
锅庄是藏族的一种舞蹈。
Guōzhuāng shì zàngzú de yìzhǒng wǔdǎo。

他烧得一手好菜，最拿手的是回锅肉。

你真心黑，吃着碗里的还想着锅里的。

to slip into/out of sth
[+room，house] 悄悄溜进/出某处
This party is boring, let\'s split.
这个聚会真无聊，我们溜吧。
It\'s late. I have to split.
要迟到了，我得先溜了。

别从我身边溜走，听见没？

温暖如春
wēnnuǎn rú chūn 
as warm as spring
深深感到友情的温暖
shēnshēn gǎn dào yǒuqíng de wēnnuǎn
keenly feel the warmth of sb.\'s friendship
天气温暖
tiānqì wēnnuǎn 
warm weather
对同志像春天般温暖
duì tóngzhì xiàng chūntiān bān wēnnuǎn 
be as mild as spring towards one\'s comrades
他的一席话温暖了我的心。
Tā de yìxíhuà wēnnuǎn le wǒ de xīn。
What he said warmed my heart.
每年秋天迁徙到温暖的地方，是大雁的常性。
Měinián qiūtiān qiānxǐ dào wēnnuǎn de dìfāng，shì dàyàn de chángxìng。
It\'s the wild geese\'s instinct to migrate to warm places every autumn.
秋日普照大地，温暖而不炎热。
Qiūrì pǔzhào dàdì，wēnnuǎn ér bùyánrè。
The autumn sun illuminates every corner of the land, it\'s warm but not torrid.
温暖的阳光
wēnnuǎn de yángguāng
warm sunshine
在那些困难的日子里，家人给了她很多温暖。
Zài nàxiē kùnnán de rìzi lǐ，jiārén gěile tā hěnduō wēnnuǎn。
Her family gave her a lot of warmth during those difficult times.
这个暖瓶不保温。
zhège nuǎnpíng bùbǎowēn。
This thermos flask doesn\'t keep the heat well.
天气转暖了，明天的温度将会在零上。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn le，míngtiān de wēndù jiāng huì zài língshàng。
It is turning warm. The temperature will be above zero tomorrow.
今年冬天是个典型的暖冬，平均气温比往年同期高出18度呢！
Jīnnián dōngtiān shì gè diǎnxíng de nuǎndōng，píngjūn qìwēn bǐ wǎngnián tóngqī gāochū yībādù ne！
This winter is a typical warm winter, its average temperature is 18 degrees higher than last year.
冬季供暖的标准是：室温不得低于16度。
Dōngjì gōngnuǎn de biāozhǔn shì：shìwēn bùdé dīyú shíliùdù。
The standard for heating in winter: the room temperature should not be lower than 16 degrees centigrade.

把生面团放在温暖的地方30分钟，使其发酵。

Nóngzhòng de zōngsè hé wēnnuǎn de huīsè tiánchōng wánle piāofú de qiángmiàn。
浓重的棕色和温暖的灰色填充完了漂浮的墙面。
Cucumber grows well in warm climatic conditions.
Huángguā zài wēnnuǎn de qìhòu tiáojiàn xià zhǎng de hǎo。
黄瓜在温暖的气候条件下长得好。
The eggs need to be put in a warm place to hatch.

鸡蛋需要放置到一个温暖的地方进行孵化。
We love to eat sushi and drink warm sake.
Wǒmen xǐhuan chī shòusī，hēzhe wēnnuǎn de rìběn qīngjiǔ。
我们喜欢吃寿司，喝着温暖的日本清酒。
The sun was warm on her back and the light sparkled on the water.
Tàiyáng wēnnuǎn le tā de bèi yángguāng zài shuǐ lǐ shǎnyào。
太阳温暖了她的背，阳光在水里闪耀。
Emily followed her across the yard into the surprisingly sunny warmth of the kitchen.
Āimǐlì gēnzhe tā chuānguò yuànzi，jìnrù chōngmǎn yángguāng de wēnnuǎn chúfáng。
埃米利跟着她穿过院子，进入充满阳光的温暖厨房。
Thorn gave him a warm and interested reception.
Suǒēn gěile tā wēnnuǎn ér yǒuqù de“huānyíng”。

By noon, the sun has already come up and it\'s getting very warm.

中午的时候，太阳已经高高升起，天气也变得很温暖了。

Yòng hòu máojīn guǒ zhù nǐ de háizi，ràng tā wēnnuǎn xiē。
用厚毛巾裹住你的孩子，让他温暖些。
Sliding deeper，he let the warm water lap around him.
Tā xiàng gèng shēnchù huáqù，ràng wēnnuǎn de shuǐ bāowéizhù tā。
他向更深处滑去，让温暖的水包围住他。
Today will be fair and warm.

今天将晴朗、温暖。
The scent is warm.
Zhèzhǒng wèidào hěn wēnnuǎn。
这种味道很温暖。

Gǒu de shétiǎn wēnnuǎn ér shīrùn。

It\'s still warm outside.

The air was warm and close--palpable as cotton.

A heating pad is calefactory.

It\'s a bit warm.
Tiānqì yǒuxiē wēnnuǎn。
天气有些温暖。
The heating was turned up high to dull his audience\'s senses.
Nuǎnqì wēndù bèi tiáo dào hěn gāo，yǐzhìyú tīngzhòng de yìshí biàn de chídùn。
暖气温度被调到很高，以至于听众的意识变得迟钝。
我家的暖气总是不热，请水暖工来检查。

The heating doesn\'t provide warm air in my house, so please send a plumber to check.
The plumber inserted a small spill into the hole to stop the leak.
水暖工把小塞子塞到洞里来止住漏水。
With global warming, northern latitudes will warm more than lower atitudes.
Suízhe quánqiú qìhòu biàn nuǎn，Běibù de wěidù Dìqū huì bǐ dīwěidù Dìqū gèng nuǎnhuo。
随着全球气候变暖，北部的纬度地区会比低纬度地区更暖和。
全球变暖是国际性的环境问题。
Quánqiú biànnuǎn shì guójìxìng de huánjìng wèntí。
Global warming is an international environmental issue.
海侵是由于全球变暖，冰山融水增加而引发的。

Global warming melts the ice in the polar regions, and the increasing water is the cause of transgression.
全球变暖致使这种植物遭受毁灭性破坏。

他讲话的大部分内容是关于全球变暖的。

近些年来，全球变暖的话题充斥着主流媒体。

Global warming concerns us all.
全球变暖和我们都有关系。
This article begins with a summary of the studies on global warming.
这篇文章的开头总结了对全球变暖的研究。
Experts have cautioned about global warming for awhile now.

就全球变暖这一问题，专家提出警告已有一段时间。

他们正尝试着签订关于全球变暖和保护生物多样性的国际协定。
The giant iceberg dissolved over the years during the global warming phase.

nuǎnsèdiào

这些天天气多变，寒暖无常。

The climate has changed a lot these days.
这个辖区的民警特别关心孤寡老人的寒暖，经常来看望他们，帮他们解决困难。
Zhège xiáqū de mínjǐng tèbié guānxīn gūguǎ lǎorén de hánnuǎn，jīngcháng lái kànwàng tāmen，bāng tāmen jiějué kùnnan。
The police in these districts are very concerned about the life of elderly without children.  They visit them frequently, and solve problems for them.
天气转暖，河面上已没有溜冰的人。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn，hémiàn shàng yǐ méiyǒu liūbīng de rén。
It is turning warm, so people no longer skate on the river.
全球变暖致使这种植物遭受毁灭性破坏。

Global warming has caused serious damage to this kind of plant.
这件机织的毛衣摸起来就很厚实，一定很暖和。

Woven by machine, this sweater feels thick. It must be very warm.
由于冷暖空气交汇，未来几天，我市以阴雨天气为主。

In the sky over our city, the cold front meets the warm front, which will bring about rainy weather over the next few days.
她这个坎肩是软羊皮的，特别暖和。
Tā zhège kǎnjiān shì ruǎnyángpí de，tèbié nuǎnhé。
Her sleeveless jacket is made of soft sheepskin and is very warm.
我家自己烧的土暖气上有一个简易的连通器。

The man-made central heating equipment of our home has a simple communicating vessel.
天气转暖了，明天的温度将会在零上。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn le，míngtiān de wēndù jiāng huì zài língshàng。
It is turning warm. The temperature will be above zero tomorrow.
天气转暖了，湖面上漂浮着很多流冰。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn le，húmiàn shàng piāofú zhe hěnduō liúbīng。
It is turning warm; many ice-floes are floating on the lake.
他们在野外笼火取暖。
Tāmen zài yěwài lónghuǒ qǔnuǎn。
They make a fire in the open air to warm themselves.
天气渐渐暖和了，他换上了一件轻薄的毛衫。
Tiānqì jiànjiàn nuǎnhé le，tā huànshàng le yíjiàn qīngbáo de máoshān。
It is turning warm, so he\'s changing into a thin sweater.
今年冬天是个典型的暖冬，平均气温比往年同期高出18度呢！
Jīnnián dōngtiān shì gè diǎnxíng de nuǎndōng，píngjūn qìwēn bǐ wǎngnián tóngqī gāochū yībādù ne！
This winter is a typical warm winter, its average temperature is 18 degrees higher than last year.
为了让全家大小都能暖肚，他只能不断地挣钱。
Wèile ràng quánjiā dàxiǎo dōu néng nuǎndù，tā zhǐnéng búduàn de zhèngqián。
To fill all the family members\' bellies, he has to make money ceaselessly.
北方的冬天，吃饭时人们都要喝些暖肚汤。
Běifāng de dōngtiān，chīfàn shí rénmen dōuyào hē xiē nuǎndùtāng。
In the winter, people in the north have some warming soup every dinner.
她身上那条绣花暖肚，是她自己制作的呢。
Tā shēnshàng nà tiáo xiùhuā nuǎndù，shì tā zìjǐ zhìzuò de ne。
The embroidered warming girdle she is wearing was made by herself.
又是春天了，暖风吹绿了树叶和草芽。
Yòu shì chūntiān le，nuǎnfēng chuīlǜ le shùyè hé cǎoyá。
Spring comes again, the warm winds blow the leaves and sprouting grass.
在开着暖风机的房间里呆久了，她觉得皮肤有些干燥。
Zài kāi zhe nuǎnfēngjī de fángjiān lǐ dāi jiǔ le，tā juédé pífū yǒuxiē gānzào。
Being in the room with a convection heater on, she felt her skin was a little bit dry.
再冷的天气，只要能喝上一碗妈妈亲自炖的汤，就会觉得暖乎乎的！
Zài lěng de tiānqì，zhǐyào néng hēshàng yìwǎn māma qīnzì dùn de tāng，jiùhuì juédé nuǎnhūhū de！
No matter how cold the weather is, a bowl of my mother\'s soup will warm me up.
这个暖棚里的蔬菜又可以提前上市了。
Zhège nuǎnpéng lǐ de shūcài yòu kěyǐ tíqián shàngshì le。
Vegetables in the greenhouse can go onto the market earlier.
她很怕冷，每到冬天就爱抱着她的暖水袋。
Tā hěnpà lěng，měi dào dōngtiān jiù ài bào zhe tā de nuǎnshuǐdài。
She is susceptible to cold. She likes to have a hot-water bottle in her arms during the winter.
暖水壶的内胆好像是坏了，开水放进去凉得很快。
Nuǎnshuǐhú de nèidǎn hǎo xiàng shì huài le，kāishuǐ fàngjìnqù liáng de hěnkuài。
The glass liner of the vacuum flask seems to be broken, the boiling water will get cold quickly.
围上女友送的围巾，他立刻感觉到了春天般的暖意。
Wéishàng nǚyǒu sòng de wéijīn，tā lìkè gǎnjué dào le chūntiān bān de nuǎnyì。
Wearing the scarf given by his girl friend, he quickly began to feel a spring-like warmth.
坐在这个皮垫上感觉十分暖和、舒适。
Zuòzài zhège pídiàn shàng gǎnjué shífēn nuǎnhé、shūshì。
It\'s warm and extremely comfortable to sit on a leather pad.
那件羊皮袍是妈妈亲手做的，我穿着特别暖和。
Nà jiàn yángpípáo shì māma qīnshǒu zuò de，wǒ chuān zhe tèbié nuǎnhé。
The sheep fur-lined robe my mom made is extremely warm.
秋日普照大地，温暖而不炎热。
Qiūrì pǔzhào dàdì，wēnnuǎn ér bùyánrè。
The autumn sun illuminates every corner of the land, it\'s warm but not torrid.
这种秋衣很保暖，我一下买了2件。
Zhèzhǒng qiūyī hěn bǎonuǎn，wǒ yíxià mǎi le liǎng jiàn。
This kind of autumn clothes keep you warm, I bought two at the same time.
大雪封了前行的道路，我们在车子里相互依偎着取暖。
Dàxuě fēng le qiánxíng de dàolù，wǒmen zài chēzi lǐ xiānghù yīwēi zhe qǔnuǎn。
The heavy snow blocked the way, we nestled together for warmth in the car
入春以来天气暖和，树木都早早地长出了新芽。
Rùchūn yǐlái tiānqì nuǎnhé，shùmù dōu zǎozǎo de zhǎngchū le xīnyá。
Since the beginning of spring, the weather has become warm, and the trees have started to sprout new leaves early.
冬季供暖的标准是：室温不得低于16度。
Dōngjì gōngnuǎn de biāozhǔn shì：shìwēn bùdé dīyú shíliùdù。
The standard for heating in winter: the room temperature should not be lower than 16 degrees centigrade.
衣服放到甩干机里甩干后，再晾在有暖气的房间里，很快就能干。
Yīfú fàngdào shuǎigānjī lǐ shuǎigān hòu，zài liàngzài yǒu nuǎnqì de fángjiān lǐ，hěnkuài jiùnéng gān。
Put the clothes into a drier, then hang them in a heated room, they will soon dry.
蔬菜暖棚都是用塑料布做的。
Shūcài nuǎnpéng dōushì yòng sùliàobùzuò de。
Greenhouses for growing vegetables are made of plastic sheet film.
他细心地对她问寒问暖，令她倍受感动。
Tā xìxīn de duì tā wènhán wènnuǎn，lìng tā bèishòu gǎndòng。
He enquires about her well being with concern, which touches her a great deal.
为了尽快还清贷款，他整天忙得席不暇暖。
Wèile jǐnkuài huánqīng dàikuǎn，tā zhěngtiān máng de xíbùxiánuǎn。
He is always too busy to make money to pay back his loans.
小寒的时候天也很冷，所以你一定要注意保暖。
Xiǎohán de shíhou tiān yě hěn lěng，suǒyǐ nǐ yídìng yào zhùyì bǎonuǎn。
It is also very cold in the Lesser Cold of the lunar calendar, keep yourself warm.
他经常对我嘘寒问暖的，让我很感动。
Tā jīngcháng duì wǒ xūhán wènnuǎn de，ràng wǒ hěn gǎndòng。
He often inquires after my well-being, which moves me a lot.
我住在房子的阳面感觉比较暖和。
Wǒ zhùzài fángzi de yángmiàn gǎnjué bǐjiào nuǎnhuo。
I live in the sunny side, so I feel warm.
随着春天的到来，天气逐渐的转暖。
Suí zhe chūntiān de dàolái，tiānqì zhújiàn de zhuǎnnuǎn。
As spring arrives, the weather is gradually becoming warmer and warmer.
天气转暖了，羊毛衫开始打折了。
Tiānqì zhuǎnnuǎn le，yángmáoshān kāishǐ dǎzhé le。
The weather is getting warm, knitted sweaters are being sold at a discount.
小明把被雪水弄湿了的帽子放在暖气片上，很快就烘干了。
Xiǎo Míng bǎ bèi xuěshuǐ nòng shī le de màozi fàngzài nuǎnqìpiàn shàng，hěnkuài jiù hōnggān le。
Xiao Ming put his cap, made wet by the snow and water, on the radiator. It soon became dry.
月租450元，不包括取暖费。
Yuèzū sìbǎiwǔshíyuán，bùbāokuò qǔnuǎnfèi。
The rent is 450 yuan a month, but this doesn\'t include heating.
我把暖瓶给打了。
Wǒ bǎ nuǎnpíng gěi dǎ le。
I broke the Thermos flask.
他冲着手哈气，好暖和些。

He breathed on his hands to warm them up.

我的牙医能让丑陋不堪的牙齿改头换面。
I wouldn\'t be seen dead in that ugly dress.
Wǒ nìngsǐ yě búyào chuān nà chǒu yīfu。
我宁死也不要穿那丑衣服。
The American public is experiencing scandal fatigue.
Měiguó gōngzhòng zhèng duì chǒuwén chǎnshēng yì zhǒng píjuàn xīnlǐ。
美国公众正对丑闻产生一种疲倦心理。
After the accounting scandal there was an erosion of confidence in the auditors.
Kuàijì chǒuwén zhīhòu，rénmen duì shěnjì rényuán shīqùle xìnxīn。
会计丑闻之后，人们对审计人员失去了信心。
The scandal threatened an abrupt end to a promising political career.
Zhège chǒuwén yǒu kěnéng shǐ yuánběn dàyǒuqiántú de zhèngzhì shēngyá jiárán\'érzhǐ。
这个丑闻有可能使原本大有前途的政治生涯戛然而止。
There was a congressional probe into the scandal.
Guóhuì zǔzhī le duì nà xiàng chǒuwén de diàochá huódòng。
国会组织了对那项丑闻的调查活动。
It brought the scandal to light.
Nà jiàn shì ràng chǒuxíng dàbáiyútiānxià。
那件事让丑行大白于天下。
Many senators were named in connection with the scandal.
Zhòngduō cānyìyuán juǎnrù gāi chǒuwén。
众多参议员卷入该丑闻。
The director was retired after the scandal.
Zhè míng dǒngshì zài fāshēng chǒuwén hòu tuìxiū le。
这名董事在发生丑闻后退休了。
The clown had lipsticked circles on his cheeks.
Xiǎochǒu yòng kǒuhóng zài tā de liǎnjiá shàng huà yuánquān。
小丑用口红在他的脸颊上画圆圈。
The clown amused the children.
Xiǎochǒu bǎ háizǐmen dòulè le。
小丑把孩子们逗乐了。
The chairman resigned over the financial scandal.
Zhè wèi zhǔxí yīn cáiwù chǒuwén cízhí。
这位主席因财务丑闻辞职。
Because of the scandal the school has fallen into disrepute.
Yóuyú zhècì chǒuwén，xuéxiào de shēngyù shòudàole sǔnhài。
由于这次丑闻，学校的声誉受到了损害。
Several of the buildings were downright homely.
Zhèxiē jiànzhùwù zhōng yǒu jǐdòng shízàishì tài chǒulòu le。
这些建筑物中有几栋实在是太丑陋了。
This building is ugly, but architecturally interesting.
Zhè dòng lóu kànshàngqù hěn chǒu，dànshì cóng jiànzhùxué jiǎodù láikàn què fēicháng yǒuqùr。
这栋楼看上去很丑，但是从建筑学角度来看却非常有趣儿。
The crowd laughed at the absurdity of the clown\'s behavior.
Rénqún duì xiǎochǒu de huájī xíngwéi bào yǐ xiàoshēng。
人群对小丑的滑稽行为报以笑声。
The paper commented editorially on the scandal.
Nà jiā bàozhǐ yǐ shèlùn de xíngshì duì gāi chǒuwén jìnxíngle bàodào。
那家报纸以社论的形式对该丑闻进行了报道。
The scandals were gaily diverting.
Chǒuwén fēicháng yǒuqù。
丑闻非常有趣。
The salesman metamorphosed into an ugly beetle.
Nà míng shòuhuòyuán biànchéngle yì zhī chǒulòu de jiǎqiàochóng。
那名售货员变成了一只丑陋的甲壳虫。
His face was harlequined with patches.
Tā liǎnshàng yòng yíkuàikuài yánsè túchéng xiǎochǒu de yàngzi。
他脸上用一块块颜色涂成小丑的样子。
The visualized scene lacked the ugly details of real life.
Xiǎngxiàng zhōng de méiyǒu xiànshí shēnghuó zhōng zhǒngzhǒng chǒulòu suǒshì de chǎngjǐng。
想象中的没有现实生活中种种丑陋琐事的场景。
Germany is not alone in its corporate spying scandals.
xiànrù Gōngsī jiàndié chǒuwén de búzhǐshì Déguó。
陷入公司间谍丑闻的不只是德国。
At the end of the season their leaves are frequently dulled and disfigured by powdery mildew.
Zài zhège jìjié mò yèzi tōngcháng méile guāngzé bìng yīn báifěnbìng ér biàn de chǒulòubùkān。
在这个季节末叶子通常没了光泽并因白粉病而变得丑陋不堪。
She became very fat and ugly in only one year.
她在一年之内变得又胖又丑。
The salesman metamorphosed into an ugly beetle.
Nà míng shòuhuòyuán biànchéngle yì zhī chǒulòu de jiǎqiàochóng。
那名售货员变成了一只丑陋的甲壳虫。
The number of pandas  in the wild are on the decline.
Yěshēng dàxióngmāo de shùliàng zài zhújiàn jiǎnshǎo。
野生大熊猫的数量在逐渐减少。
Once small wild cats are weaned, they can be moved outdoors into a natural-like enclosure.
小野猫断奶以后，就可以被移至仿生态的场地中生活。
野猫探井
yěmāo tànjǐng
wildcat
The moggy is most closely related to the African and European wild cat.
与家猫亲缘关系最近的是非洲野猫和欧洲野猫。
The Wildcats are favorite to win.
野猫队最可能会胜出。
There are 36 species of wild cats around the world.
世界上共有36种野猫。
Once small wild cats are weaned, they can be moved outdoors into a natural-like enclosure.
小野猫断奶以后，就可以被移至仿生态的场地中生活。
The number of pandas  in the wild are on the decline.
Yěshēng dàxióngmāo de shùliàng zài zhújiàn jiǎnshǎo。
野生大熊猫的数量在逐渐减少。
雄猫
xióngmāo 
tomcat
他经常凌虐自家的小猫小狗。
Tā jīngcháng língnüè zìjiā de xiǎomāo xiǎogǒu。
He often abuses the puppies, and kittens in his home.
我养的小猫和小狗竟然可以款洽地同住一室。
Wǒ yǎng de xiǎomāo hé xiǎogǒu jìngrán kěyǐ kuǎnqià de tóngzhù yí shì。
The cat and the dog I raise can live in a room cordially and harmoniously.
她的小猫死了，她很伤心地为它修起了一个小小的坟冢。
Tā de xiǎomāo sǐ le，tā hěnshāngxīn de wèi tā xiūqǐ le yígè xiǎoxiǎo de fénzhǒng。
Saddened by the death of her cat, she built a small grave for it.
小猫在桌子腿上蹭痒痒。
Xiǎo māo zài zhuōzituǐ shàng cèng yǎngyang。
The kitten is scratching its back against the table leg.
我们的邻居想把五只小猫都给我们，我们只留了一只。
Wǒmen de línjū xiǎngbǎ wǔ zhī xiǎo māo dōu gěi wǒmen，wǒmen zhǐ liú le yì zhī。
Our neighbours wanted to give us all of their five kittens, but we only took one.
小姑娘亲热地搂抱着小猫。
Xiǎo gūniangqīnrè de lǒubào zhe xiǎo māo。
The little girl cuddled her pet cat.
小猫
xiǎomāo 
kitten
小猫一饿就咪咪叫。
Xiǎomāo yí è jiù mīmī jiào。
The kittens mewed when they were hungry.
小猫在沙发上蜷作一团睡觉。
Xiǎomāo zài shāfā shàng quánzuò yìtuán shuìjiào。
The kitten was sleeping curled up on the sofa.
小猫出去找食儿了。
Xiǎomāo chūqù zhǎo shír le。
The kittens are out looking for food.
小猫隐伏在草丛里。
Xiǎomāo yǐnfú zài cǎocónglǐ。
The cat lay hidden in the grass.
小猫捉到一只老鼠。
Xiǎomāo zhuōdào yìzhī lǎoshǔ。
The little cat caught a rat.
那只受伤的小猫整夜地哀号。
Nà zhī shòushāng de xiǎomāo zhěngyè de āiháo。
The injured kitten moaned the whole night.
这两只小猫总是这么爱昵。
Zhè liǎng zhī xiǎomāo zǒngshì zhème àinì。
The cats just can\'t get off each other.
小猫总是巴头探脑地望着它的主人。
Xiǎomāo zǒngshì bātóu tànnǎo de wàng zhe tā de zhǔrén。
The kitten always tilts its head, and looks at its owner innocently.
小猫伏贴在主人的身边。
Xiǎomāo fútiēzài zhǔrén de shēnbiān。
The kitten stays close to its owner.
小猫刚才还在这里，可转眼就不见了，这太让人纳闷儿了。
Xiǎomāo gāngcái hái zài zhèlǐ，kě zhuǎnyǎn jiù bújiàn le，zhè tài ràng rén nàmènr le。
The cat was here just now. I am really puzzled that it disappeared in an instant.
小猫蟠据在它主人的床上，睡得可香了。
Xiǎomāo pánjù zài tā zhǔrén de chuáng shàng，shuì de kěxiāng le。
The cat is occupying its master\'s bed, sleeping soundly.
小猫的前爪好像是受伤了，走起路来一瘸一拐的。
Xiǎomāo de qiánzhuǎ hǎo xiàng shì shòushāng le，zǒuqǐlùlái yìqué yìguǎi de。
One of the cat\'s forepaws has been injured, it stumbles when it walks.
小猫对那只老鼠穷追不舍。
Xiǎomāo duì nàzhī lǎoshǔ qióngzhuībùshě。
The cat keeps on chasing after the mouse.
小猫的身体摸起来软乎乎的。
Xiǎomāo de shēntǐ mō qǐlái ruǎnhūhū de。
The body of the cat feels soft.
小猫喜欢追着尾巴转圈。
Xiǎomāo xǐhuan zhuī zhe wěibā zhuànquān。
Kitties like to chase their tails by running in circles.
小猫把土顶起来了。
Xiǎo māo bǎ tǔ dǐngqǐláile。
The kitten is pushing up the soil.
他回来就一把抓起香肠放到嘴里，好像个小馋猫。
Tā huílái jiù yìbǎ zhuāqǐ xiāngcháng fàng dào zuǐ lǐ，hǎo xiàng gè xiǎochánmāo。
He stuffed a sausage into his mouth the moment he got home, just like a little greedy cat.
小熊猫跟大熊猫长得一点都不像。
Xiǎoxióngmāo gēn dàxióngmāo zhǎng de yìdiǎn dōu bú xiàng。
The little panda is not like the giant panda at all.
这只大花猫一口就把小老鼠吞掉了。
Zhèzhī dàhuāmāo yìkǒu jiù bǎ xiǎolǎoshǔ tūndiào le。
This big colorful cat ate the little mouse in just one gulp.
猫头鹰捕食鼠、麻雀等小动物。
Māotóuyīngbǔshí shǔ、máquè děngxiǎo dòngwù。
Owls prey (or feed) on mice, sparrows, and other small animals.
这只猫非常强壮，荤似一只小老虎。
Zhèzhī māo fēicháng qiángzhuàng，hūnsì yìzhī xiǎolǎohǔ。
This cat is very strong, exactly like a little tiger.
小猫喵喵叫。
这只猫一胎下了五只小猫。
逗弄着小猫玩儿
小猫咪咪地叫着
她咪咪地叫她的小猫。
像小猫一样温驯。
小花猫卧在窗台上。
小姑娘搂住熊猫玩具不肯松手。
这只熊猫的年龄也不小了。
The kitten seems too small but he\'s actually bursting with energy.
这只小猫看似弱小，实则精力充沛。
A small cat skinned through the hole in the wall.
Zhè zhī xiǎomāo miǎnqiǎng jǐguòle qiáng shàng de nàgè xiǎodòng。
这只小猫勉强挤过了墙上的那个小洞。
Do you have a wool ball? Cats love playing with it.
你有毛线团儿吗？小猫儿就喜欢玩这东西。
Any cat - skinny, fat, young or old can be trained to use the toilet bowl!
不论是胖猫,瘦猫,老猫,小猫都可以被训练学会使用冲水马桶.
She simply adored the kitten she got for her birthday.
Tā duì zài shēngrì nàtiān dédào de xiǎo māo xǐhuan de bùdéliǎo。
她对在生日那天得到的小猫喜欢得不得了。
A black female cat sat on the floor while her three kittens crawled behind her.
Yì zhī hēisè de mǔmāo zuòzài dìbǎn shàng，sān zhī xiǎomāo zài tā shēnhòu páláipáqù。
一只黑色的母猫坐在地板上，三只小猫在她身后爬来爬去。
The cat snatched at the butterflies.
Xiǎo māo yìbǎ zhuāzhù húdié。
小猫一把抓住蝴蝶。
The cat washes several times a day.
Nàgè xiǎomāo yì tiān xǐ hǎo jǐ cì liǎn。
那个小猫一天洗好几次脸。
Our cat kittened again this year.
Wǒmen jiā nà zhǐ māo jīnnián yòu shēngxià yì wō xiǎomāo。
我们家那只猫今年又生下一窝小猫。
He drowned the kittens.
Tā yānsǐle xiǎomāo。
他淹死了小猫。
The kitten was weaned and fed by its owner with a bottle.

这只小猫被它的主人断奶并用奶瓶喂养。
The cat draped herself on the sofa.

小猫卷缩在沙发上。

小野猫断奶以后，就可以被移至仿生态的场地中生活。
They left a small opening for the cat at the bottom of the door.
Tāmen zài mén de dǐbù liúle yí gè gōng māo jìnchū de xiǎo dòng。
他们在门的底部留了一个供猫进出的小洞。
这次上山考察熊猫生活，他抢下了很多珍贵的镜头。
Zhècì shàngshān kǎochá xióngmāo shēnghuó，tā qiǎngxià le hěnduō zhēnguì de jìngtóu。
During this expedition to study the life of the giant panda, he took a lot of valuable snapshots.
大熊猫对人山人海的参观者已经习以为常了。
Dàxióngmāo duì rénshānrénhǎi de cānguānzhě yǐjīng xíyǐwéichángle。
The panda has long become accustomed to the huge crowds of visitors.
大熊猫出没于川西山区。
Dàxióngmāo chūmò yú Chuānxī shānqū。
The mountainous areas of western Sichuan are the haunt of the giant panda.
He looked up and saw a hunting owl had just snatched a little bird out of the air.
他抬头看见一只猫头鹰在空中抓住了一只山雀。

The cat was here just now. I am really puzzled that it disappeared in an instant.
人们围着看熊猫，我挤不进去，一眼也没瞧上。

People crowded round the panda and I couldn\'t squeeze in, so I didn\'t get a chance to see it.
小猫刚才还在这里，可转眼就不见了，这太让人纳闷儿了。
Xiǎomāo gāngcái hái zài zhèlǐ，kě zhuǎnyǎn jiù bújiàn le，zhè tài ràng rén nàmènr le。
The cat was here just now. I am really puzzled that it disappeared in an instant.
I didn\'t want the cat to draw too much attention, I was thinking he would be a minor part of the portrait.
我不想让猫太显眼了，我在想它应该只是画像中的配角。
A blind cat was torn to pieces by a pitbull.
Yì zhī máng yǎn de māo bèi dòuniúquǎn sīchéngle suìpiàn。
一只盲眼的猫被斗牛犬撕成了碎片。
You are looking into the unblinking eyes of owls, who sleep with one open.
你正看在看得是猫头鹰一眨不眨的眼,它们睡觉时只闭一只眼睛。
小猫在沙发上蜷作一团睡觉。

The kitten was sleeping curled up on the sofa.
I\'m so angry; the cat is always on the sofa.
那只猫总在沙发上，这让我很生气。

Nà zhī māo zài bùtíng de zhuā shāfā。
那只猫在不停地抓沙发。
猫科动物
māokē dòngwù
animals of the cat family
老虎是猫科的一种。
Lǎohǔ shì māokē de yì zhǒng。
The tiger belongs to the cat family.
猫科
māokē
cat family
虎是猫科豹属动物。
The great cats are tigers,lions,etc.
大猫科动物有虎、狮等。
The cat family includes lions and tigers.
猫科家族也包括狮子和老虎。
Most people opt for the furry friendliness of the cat family.
Dàbùfènrén xuǎnzé máoróngróng ér yǒushàn de māokē dòngwù。
大部分人选择毛茸茸而友善的猫科动物。
Of all the big cats the leopard is the most adaptable.
Zài suǒyǒu de dàxíng māokē dòngwù zhōng，bào shì shìyìngxìng zuì qiáng de yì zhǒng。
在所有的大型猫科动物中，豹是适应性最强的一种。
These large cats are active primarily at night, on the hunt for deer, rabbits, and other mammals
Zhèxiē dàxíng de māokē dòngwù zhǔyào zài wǎnshang huóyuè，zhǔnbèi bǔliè lùqún，tùzi hé qítā yìxiē dòngwù。
这些大型的猫科动物主要在晚上活跃，准备捕猎鹿群，兔子和其它一些动物。
Members of the cat family have like dispositions.
Māokē dòngwù yōngyǒu xiāngsì de xíxìng。
猫科动物拥有相似的习性。
我们把猫的叫声误听成是警号了。
Wǒmen bǎ māo de jiàoshēng wùtīng chéng shì jǐnghào le。
We took the mew of a cat as a sound of warning.
几个孩子正在院子里面玩藏猫儿的游戏。
Jǐ gè háizi zhèngzài yuànzi lǐmian wán cángmāor de yóuxì。
Some children are playing hide-and-seek in the yard.
我觉得这张合同里面一定有什么猫儿腻。
Wǒ juédé zhèzhāng hétong lǐmian yídìng yǒu shénme māornì。
I think there must be something very fishy about this contract.
他不是个诚实的人，就爱耍猫儿腻。
Tā búshì gè chéngshí de rén，jiù ài shuǎ māornì。
He is not an honest man, and is fond of playing tricks.
这事儿准有猫腻。
Zhèshìr zhǔn yǒu máonì。
There is something fishy behind this.
小猫出去找食儿了。
Xiǎomāo chūqù zhǎo shír le。
The kittens are out looking for food.
妈妈说宝宝的睡态很好玩儿，像个熊猫。
Māma shuō bǎobao de shuìtài hěnhǎowánr，xiàng gè xióngmāo。
Mom said that the baby\'s sleeping posture was very funny, like a panda.
儿童节那天，妈妈带宝宝去动物园看了大熊猫。
Értóng Jié nàtiān，māma dài bǎobǎo qù dòngwùyuán kàn le dàxióngmāo。
On Children\'s Day, the mother took her little child to the zoo to see the pandas.
小猫刚才还在这里，可转眼就不见了，这太让人纳闷儿了。
Xiǎomāo gāngcái hái zài zhèlǐ，kě zhuǎnyǎn jiù bújiàn le，zhè tài ràng rén nàmènr le。
The cat was here just now. I am really puzzled that it disappeared in an instant.
怀疑账目里有猫儿腻。
别跟我玩猫儿腻，我心里有数。
逗弄着小猫玩儿
Do you have a wool ball? Cats love playing with it.
你有毛线团儿吗？小猫儿就喜欢玩这东西。
这只郎猫一直在追逐那只美丽的白色母猫。
Zhèzhī lángmāo yìzhí zài zhuīzhú nàzhī měilì de báisè mǔmāo。
The tomcat has been chasing the beautiful white female cat.
我从农贸市场买了两斤猫鱼准备回家喂猫。
Wǒ cóng nóngmào shìchǎng mǎi le liǎng jīn māoyú zhǔnbèi huíjiā wèimāo。
I\'ve bought two kilos of small fish from the farmers’ market, and plan to feed the cat at home.
小熊猫跟大熊猫长得一点都不像。
Xiǎoxióngmāo gēn dàxióngmāo zhǎng de yìdiǎn dōu bú xiàng。
The little panda is not like the giant panda at all.
猫头鹰白天躲在暗处。
Māotóuyīng báitiān duǒ zài ànchù。
Owls stay in dark places in the daytime.
猫头鹰在夜间捕食。
Māotóuyīngzài yèjiān bǔshí。
Owls prey at night.
猫头鹰捕食鼠、麻雀等小动物。
Māotóuyīngbǔshí shǔ、máquè děngxiǎo dòngwù。
Owls prey (or feed) on mice, sparrows, and other small animals.
大熊猫是一种残存的古动物。
Dàxióngmāo shì yì zhǒng cáncún de gǔ dòngwù。
The giant panda is one of the surviving ancient animal species.
小猫在桌子腿上蹭痒痒。
Xiǎo māo zài zhuōzituǐ shàng cèng yǎngyang。
The kitten is scratching its back against the table leg.
熊猫每胎产仔一到二只。
Xióngmāo měi tāi chǎnzǎi yídào èr zhī。
A female panda bears only one or two young per litter.
大熊猫出没于川西山区。
Dàxióngmāo chūmò yú Chuānxī shānqū。
The mountainous areas of western Sichuan are the haunt of the giant panda.
猫蹿到树上去了。
Māo cuāndào shù shàng qù le。
The cat leapt up into the tree.
猫逮老鼠。
Māo dǎi lǎoshǔ。
Cats catch mice.
猫拱了拱腰。
Māo gǒng le gǒng yāo。
The cat arched its back.
熊猫号称是中国的国宝。
Xióngmāo hàochèngshì Zhōngguó de guóbǎo。
The Giant Panda is known as the national treasure of China.
猫科动物
māokē dòngwù
animals of the cat family
猫头鹰是鼠类的克星。
Māotóuyīngshì shǔlèi de kèxīng。
The owl is the natural enemy of mice and rats.
大灵猫
dàlíngmāo 
zibet
我们的邻居想把五只小猫都给我们，我们只留了一只。
Wǒmen de línjū xiǎngbǎ wǔ zhī xiǎo māo dōu gěi wǒmen，wǒmen zhǐ liú le yì zhī。
Our neighbours wanted to give us all of their five kittens, but we only took one.
小姑娘亲热地搂抱着小猫。
Xiǎo gūniangqīnrè de lǒubào zhe xiǎo māo。
The little girl cuddled her pet cat.
雄猫
xióngmāo 
tomcat
小猫
xiǎomāo 
kitten
他一听我们到来，就赶紧猫起来了。
Tā yì tīngwǒmen dàolái，jiù gǎnjǐn māo qǐlái le。
As soon as he heard us coming, he quickly hid himself somewhere.
正派人不玩猫腻。
Zhèngpàirén bùwán máonì。
An honest person never plays tricks.
这事儿准有猫腻。
Zhèshìr zhǔn yǒu máonì。
There is something fishy behind this.
小猫一饿就咪咪叫。
Xiǎomāo yí è jiù mīmī jiào。
The kittens mewed when they were hungry.
这次上山考察熊猫生活，他抢下了很多珍贵的镜头。
Zhècì shàngshān kǎochá xióngmāo shēnghuó，tā qiǎngxià le hěnduō zhēnguì de jìngtóu。
During this expedition to study the life of the giant panda, he took a lot of valuable snapshots.
人们围着看熊猫，我挤不进去，一眼也没瞧上。
Rénmen wéi zhe kàn xióngmāo，wǒ jǐ bú jìnqù，yì yǎn yě méi qiáoshàng。
People crowded round the panda and I couldn\'t squeeze in, so I didn\'t get a chance to see it.
小猫在沙发上蜷作一团睡觉。
Xiǎomāo zài shāfā shàng quánzuò yìtuán shuìjiào。
The kitten was sleeping curled up on the sofa.
小猫出去找食儿了。
Xiǎomāo chūqù zhǎo shír le。
The kittens are out looking for food.
有个东西在黑影里蹲着，我也看不清它到底是猫还是狗。
Yǒu gè dōngxi zài hēiyǐng lǐ dūn zhe，wǒ yě kàn bu qīng tā dàodǐ shì māo háishi gǒu。
Some animal was crouching in the shadow. I couldn\'t make out whether it was a cat or a dog.
野猫探井
yěmāo tànjǐng
wildcat
熊猫的习性
xióngmāo de xíxìng
the habits and characteristics of the giant panda
猫是很驯服的。
Māo shì hěn xùnfú de。
Cats are very docile.
小猫隐伏在草丛里。
Xiǎomāo yǐnfú zài cǎocónglǐ。

老虎是猫科的一种。
Lǎohǔ shì māokē de yì zhǒng。
The tiger belongs to the cat family.
猫把孩子的手抓了。
Māo bǎ háizi de shǒu zhuā le。

猫爪子
māozhuǎzi 
a cat\'s paws
小猫捉到一只老鼠。
Xiǎomāo zhuōdào yìzhī lǎoshǔ。

猫哭老鼠——假慈悲
māokūlǎoshǔ——jiǎcíbēi
the cat weeping over the dead mouse—shed crocodile tears
空谈很容易，是阿猫阿狗都能做的事情。
Kōngtán hěnróngyì，shì āmāo āgǒu dōu néng zuò de shìqing。
It\'s easy to talk. Everyone does it.
那只受伤的小猫整夜地哀号。
Nà zhī shòushāng de xiǎomāo zhěngyè de āiháo。
The injured kitten moaned the whole night.
窗外的流浪猫不停地哀叫。
Chuāngwài de liúlàngmāo bùtíng de āijiào。
The stray cats outside the window keep moaning.
这两只小猫总是这么爱昵。
Zhè liǎng zhī xiǎomāo zǒngshì zhème àinì。
The cats just can\'t get off each other.
小猫总是巴头探脑地望着它的主人。
Xiǎomāo zǒngshì bātóu tànnǎo de wàng zhe tā de zhǔrén。
The kitten always tilts its head, and looks at its owner innocently.
几个孩子正在院子里面玩藏猫儿的游戏。
Jǐ gè háizi zhèngzài yuànzi lǐmian wán cángmāor de yóuxì。
Some children are playing hide-and-seek in the yard.
他回来就一把抓起香肠放到嘴里，好像个小馋猫。
Tā huílái jiù yìbǎ zhuāqǐ xiāngcháng fàng dào zuǐ lǐ，hǎo xiàng gè xiǎochánmāo。
He stuffed a sausage into his mouth the moment he got home, just like a little greedy cat.
这几排翠竹成了大熊猫的乐园。
Zhè jǐ pái cuìzhú chéng le dàxióngmāo de lèyuán。
These lines of emerald bamboos have become a playground for pandas.
灯影下忽然蹿出只猫来。
Dēngyǐng xià hūrán cuānchū zhī māo lái。
A cat suddenly jumped out from the shaded area.
儿童节那天，妈妈带宝宝去动物园看了大熊猫。
Értóng Jié nàtiān，māma dài bǎobǎo qù dòngwùyuán kàn le dàxióngmāo。
On Children\'s Day, the mother took her little child to the zoo to see the pandas.
看着加菲猫那肥头大耳的样子，观众忍不住都乐了。
Kàn zhe jiāfēimāo nà féitóudà\'ěr de yàngzi，guānzhòng rěn bú zhù dōu lè le。
The audience are amused by Garfield\'s fat and funny looks.
她的小猫死了，她很伤心地为它修起了一个小小的坟冢。
Tā de xiǎomāo sǐ le，tā hěnshāngxīn de wèi tā xiūqǐ le yígè xiǎoxiǎo de fénzhǒng。
Saddened by the death of her cat, she built a small grave for it.
小猫伏贴在主人的身边。
Xiǎomāo fútiēzài zhǔrén de shēnbiān。
The kitten stays close to its owner.
憨态可掬的大熊猫是动物园中最受欢迎的明星。
Hāntài kějū de dàxióngmāo shì dòngwùyuán zhōng zuì shòu huānyíng de míngxīng。
With an air of charming naivety, the panda is the most popular star in zoo.
这只猫非常强壮，荤似一只小老虎。
Zhèzhī māo fēicháng qiángzhuàng，hūnsì yìzhī xiǎolǎohǔ。
This cat is very strong, exactly like a little tiger.
箭竹的嫩叶子是大熊猫的主要食物。
Jiànzhú de nènyèzi shì dàxióngmāo de zhǔyào shíwù。
Giant pandas mainly live on arrow bamboo.
他家的猫一到夜里就叫春，真烦人。
Tā jiā de māo yídào yèlǐ jiù jiàochūn，zhēn fánrén。
His cat calls out all night, which is rather disturbing.
我们把猫的叫声误听成是警号了。
Wǒmen bǎ māo de jiàoshēng wùtīng chéng shì jǐnghào le。
We took the mew of a cat as a sound of warning.
大熊猫吃起竹子来喀吧喀吧的，吃得可香了。
Dàxióngmāo chī qǐ zhúzi lái kāba kāba de，chī de kě xiāng le。
Pandas enjoy eating bamboo very much and always make a snapping sound while eating.
大熊猫不吃枯竹，所以你必须喂它新鲜的竹子。
Dàxióngmāo bùchī kūzhú，suǒyǐ nǐ bìxū wèi tā xīnxiān de zhúzi。
Pandas do not eat withered bamboo, so you must feed them with fresh bamboo leaves.
我养的小猫和小狗竟然可以款洽地同住一室。
Wǒ yǎng de xiǎomāo hé xiǎogǒu jìngrán kěyǐ kuǎnqià de tóngzhù yí shì。
The cat and the dog I raise can live in a room cordially and harmoniously.
他曾经被猫的利爪抓伤过。
Tā céngjīng bèi māo de lìzhǎo zhuāshāng guò。
He was once scratched by the sharp claws of a cat.
他经常凌虐自家的小猫小狗。
Tā jīngcháng língnüè zìjiā de xiǎomāo xiǎogǒu。
He often abuses the puppies, and kittens in his home.
刚刚开始学习模特课程，她的猫步还走不好呢。
Gānggāng kāishǐ xuéxí mótè kèchéng，tā de māobùhái zǒubùhǎo ne。
She has begun a modeling course, and can not walk the cat walk well.
我觉得这张合同里面一定有什么猫儿腻。
Wǒ juédé zhèzhāng hétong lǐmian yídìng yǒu shénme māornì。
I think there must be something very fishy about this contract.
他不是个诚实的人，就爱耍猫儿腻。
Tā búshì gè chéngshí de rén，jiù ài shuǎ māornì。
He is not an honest man, and is fond of playing tricks.
小猫刚才还在这里，可转眼就不见了，这太让人纳闷儿了。
Xiǎomāo gāngcái hái zài zhèlǐ，kě zhuǎnyǎn jiù bújiàn le，zhè tài ràng rén nàmènr le。
The cat was here just now. I am really puzzled that it disappeared in an instant.
小猫蟠据在它主人的床上，睡得可香了。
Xiǎomāo pánjù zài tā zhǔrén de chuáng shàng，shuì de kěxiāng le。
The cat is occupying its master\'s bed, sleeping soundly.
小猫的前爪好像是受伤了，走起路来一瘸一拐的。
Xiǎomāo de qiánzhuǎ hǎo xiàng shì shòushāng le，zǒuqǐlùlái yìqué yìguǎi de。
One of the cat\'s forepaws has been injured, it stumbles when it walks.
小猫对那只老鼠穷追不舍。
Xiǎomāo duì nàzhī lǎoshǔ qióngzhuībùshě。
The cat keeps on chasing after the mouse.
小猫的身体摸起来软乎乎的。
Xiǎomāo de shēntǐ mō qǐlái ruǎnhūhū de。
The body of the cat feels soft.
妈妈说宝宝的睡态很好玩儿，像个熊猫。
Māma shuō bǎobao de shuìtài hěnhǎowánr，xiàng gè xióngmāo。
Mom said that the baby\'s sleeping posture was very funny, like a panda.
猫的睡姿十分可爱。
Māo de shuìzī shífēn kě\'ài。
Cats\' sleeping postures are very cute.
这只大花猫一口就把小老鼠吞掉了。
Zhèzhī dàhuāmāo yìkǒu jiù bǎ xiǎolǎoshǔ tūndiào le。
This big colorful cat ate the little mouse in just one gulp.
这只老鼠被猫戏弄了半天，终于一命於戏了。
Zhèzhī lǎoshǔ bèi māo xìnòng le bàntiān，zhōng yú yímìng yúxì le。
The cat played with the rat for a long time, before the rat finally died.
我循声一看，原来是一只猫。
Wǒ xúnshēng yíkàn，yuánlái shì yìzhī māo。
I followed the sound and found a cat.
驯熟的熊猫还会骑自行车呢，真滑稽。
Xùnshú de xióngmāo hái huì qí zìxíngchē ne，zhēn huájī。
It\'s so funny that a tamed panda can even ride a bike.
以竹子为食的熊猫喜欢居住在竹林中。
Yǐ zhúzi wéishí de xióngmāo xǐhuan jūzhùzài zhúlin zhōng。
Pandas, for whom bamboo is the main food, like to live in bamboo forests.
小猫喜欢追着尾巴转圈。
Xiǎomāo xǐhuan zhuī zhe wěibā zhuànquān。
Kitties like to chase their tails by running in circles.
小猫把土顶起来了。
Xiǎo māo bǎ tǔ dǐngqǐláile。
The kitten is pushing up the soil.

Allergy to cats is extremely common, and can be a major problem even for people who don\'t own cats.
对猫过敏是非常普遍的，即使这对那些不养猫的人来说也是个大问题。

The female panda accepted the younger male panda.
Mǔ xióngmāo jiēshòule jiào niánqīng de gōng xióngmāo de qiú\'ài。

Those who especially like or dislike cats would have strong emotive associations with cats.
Nàxiē tèbié xǐhuan huò bù xǐhuan māo de rén kěnéng duì māo jùyǒu qiángliè de qíngxù jìyì。

A black female cat sat on the floor while her three kittens crawled behind her.
Yì zhī hēisè de mǔmāo zuòzài dìbǎn shàng，sān zhī xiǎomāo zài tā shēnhòu páláipáqù。

Cats litter everywhere especially when they are not trained to litter in the proper places.
Māo chángcháng dàochù nòng wō，yóuqí shì wèi jīng zuò wō xùnliàn de māo。

Cats sleep nine-tenths of the time.
猫大部分时间都在睡觉。

有十多只猫躺在柱子下面晒太阳。

这是我第一次在动物园里看到熊猫宝宝。

你有毛线团儿吗？小猫儿就喜欢玩这东西。

猫把身子蜷起来是因为它想睡觉了。
I\'m so angry; the cat is always on the sofa.
那只猫总在沙发上，这让我很生气。

我想知道我的猫失踪了以后怎么样了。

《猫》是最流行的现代音乐剧之一。
The panda bear is a native of China.
熊猫的故乡是中国。
Many zoos around the world continue to seek pandas from China.

失去平衡
shīqù pínɡhénɡ

judge by this standard
衡量
héngliáng
weigh; measure; judge

不能把钱作为衡量幸福的惟一标准。

dùliánghéng

the canons of good taste
(衡量)情趣(或礼貌)的准则

绘画大师的作品价值是没有办法用钱来衡量的。

一些宝物的考古学价值和历史价值是无法用金钱衡量的。

我们通过审计来衡量运作的成本。

频率即衡量单位时间里重复事件发生的次数。
The measure of success is not one\'s bank account.
衡量成功的标准不在于钱财的多少。
Test scores are not the only yardstick of a students\' ability.
考试分数并不是衡量学生能力的唯一标准。
It is by any standards a clumsy piece of writing.
Yǐ rènhé biāozhǔn lái héngliáng，zhè dōushì piān zhuōliè de xízuò。
以任何标准来衡量，这都是篇拙劣的习作。
It is used as a measure of the child\'s comprehension of spoken language.
Tā bèi yònglái héngliáng háizi duì kǒuyǔ de lǐjiě chéngdù。
它被用来衡量孩子对口语的理解程度。
The criteria against which to measure success are termed performance indicators.
Yònglái héngliáng chénggōng de biāozhǔn chēngwéi yèjì zhǐbiāo。
用来衡量成功的标准称为业绩指标。
Conditions at the training school left much to be desired by modern standards.
Yǐ xiàndài biāozhǔn lái héngliáng，jìgōng xuéxiào de tiáojiàn bìng bú lìngrénmǎnyì。
以现代标准来衡量，技工学校的条件并不令人满意。
The capacity of a hard disk drive is usually expressed in megabytes.
Yìngpánqūdòngqì de róngliàng tōngcháng shì yǐ zhào wéi dānwèi lái héngliáng de。
硬盘驱动器的容量通常是以兆为单位来衡量的。
The current was measured in amperes.
Diànliú de héngliáng dānwèi shì ānpéi。
电流的衡量单位是安培。
His painting sets the benchmark of quality.
Tā de huà chéngwéi héngliáng huìhuà pǐnzhì de biāozhǔn。
他的画成为衡量绘画品质的标准。
The mansion seemed grandly large by today\'s standards.
Yòng jīntiān de biāozhǔn lái héngliáng，zhège gōngyù kànqǐlái fùlìtánghuáng。
用今天的标准来衡量，这个公寓看起来富丽堂皇。
The sperm count is used as an indicator of male fertility.
Nánxìng shēngyùnénglì kěyǐ yòng jīngzǐshù lái héngliáng。
男性生育能力可以用精子数来衡量。

Cape hé Q zhí héngliáng duìxiàng bùtóng。
Cape和Q值衡量对象不同。
weights and measures
度量衡
Different measurement systems use different units.
不同的度量衡制使用不同的单位系统。
The weights and measures were standardized.
Dùliànghéng yǐjīng biāozhǔnhuà le。
度量衡已经标准化了。
His book addresses the question of tension between the individual and the state.
Tā zhè běn shū chǎnshùle gèrén yǔ guójiā zhījiān lìliàng jūnhéng de wèntí。
他这本书阐述了个人与国家之间力量均衡的问题。
A black body maintained at a constant temperature is a full radiator at that temperature because the radiation reaching and leaving it must be in equilibrium.
Hēisè wùtǐ zài héngwēn tiáojiàn xià shì wēndù de wánquán fúshèqì，yīnwèi dàodá hé líkāi gāi wùtǐ de fúshèliàng bìxū bǎochí pínghéng。
黑色物体在恒温条件下是温度的完全辐射器，因为到达和离开该物体的辐射量必须保持平衡。
Our military resources are no rival of our neighbor.
我国的军事力量无法与邻国抗衡。

如有必要，压载水舱会消除重量差异以保持船体平衡。
The least preponderance in either pan will unbalance the scale.

In all perfectly beautiful objects there is found the opposition of one part to another and a reciprocal balance.
Suǒyǒu jíwéi měilì de dōngxi dōu yǒu xiānghù duìyìng de liǎnggè bùfen hé xiānghù pínghéng。
所有极为美丽的东西都有相互对应的两个部分和相互平衡。
平衡是相对的，不平衡是绝对的。
Pínghéngshì xiāngduì de，bùpínghéngshì juéduì de。
Balance is relative, imbalance is absolute.

In order to balance the books, our governments are hitting us with ever more crippling taxes.

There are busy times and slower times and it\'s all about striking a balance with my work.

近年来，患有高血脂的人越来越多。
Jìnnián lái，huànyǒu gāoxuèzhī de rén yuèláiyuè duō。
The number of people who have high levels of blood lipids has increased in recent years.
他患有结石病，一病发就疼得汗珠直淌。

He has lithiasis, and the violent pain makes him sweat.
经诊断，他患有浸润性肺结核。

He has been diagnosed with infiltrative pulmonary tuberculosis.
他的儿子生下来就患有裂唇症。

His son was born with harelip.
这位产妇患有先天性心脏病，必须剖腹产。

The pregnant woman has a congenital heart disease, she has to have a Caesarean section.
患有胎毒的儿童需要尽早治疗。
Huànyǒu tāidú de értóng xūyào jìnzǎo zhìliáo。

你患有糖尿病，以后不能再喝甜酒了。

Wǒ huàn le zhòng gǎnmào，húnshēn suānlǎn nánshòu。
I\'ve caught a heavy cold and feel limp, with aches all over my body.
患有胎毒的儿童需要尽早治疗。
Huànyǒu tāidú de értóng xūyào jìnzǎo zhìliáo。

你患有糖尿病，以后不能再喝甜酒了。
Nǐ huànyǒu tángniàobìng，yǐhòu bùnéng zài hē tiánjiǔ le。

对一个患晚期食道癌的病人来说，死亡未始不是一种解脱。
Duì yígè huàn wǎnqī shídàoái de bìngrén láishuō，sǐwáng wèishǐ búshì yìzhǒng jiětuō。
Death is not an escape for someone who suffers from terminal esophageal cancer.
煤气瓶不能有一点点罅隙，否则会造成安全瘾患。
Méiqìpíng bùnéng yǒu yìdiǎndiǎn xiàxì，fǒuzé huì zàochéng Ānquányǐnhuàn。
There can not be any leaks in the gas jar, otherwise it may cause accident.
心梗必须及时抢救，否则患者会有生命危险。

Myocardial infarction must be treated immediately, otherwise the patient will die.
患病期间禁止行房。
Huànbìng qījiān jìnzhǐ xíngfáng。
Don\'t have sexual intercourse while you ar ill.
我们决不可养痈遗患，一定要斩草除根。
Wǒmen jué bùkě yǎngyōng yíhuàn，yídìng yào zhǎncǎo chúgēn。
We can never leave evil unchecked, we must remove the source of the trouble.
他什么时候患上夜游症的，好恐怖。
Tā shénme shíhou huànshàng yèyóuzhèng de，hǎo kǒngbù。
When did he contract somnambulism? It\'s horrible.
鸦片祸国殃民，贻患无穷，我们反对吸食鸦片。

这项仪器，只适用于中老年患者。

凯撒铁腕统治了十年。
My favorite writer，without a doubt，is Guy Gavriel Kay.
Wúyōngzhìyí，wǒ zuì xǐhuan de zuòjiā shì Gàiyī·Jiāwéiěr·Kǎi。
无庸置疑，我最喜欢的作家是盖伊·加维尔·凯。
Kate spoke to him about the shock result.
Jiù zhège zhènjīng de jiéguǒ，Kǎitè zébèile tā。
就这个震惊的结果，凯特责备了他。
Helen Keller felt the physical world by touching people and objects around her.
Hǎilún·kǎilēi tōngguò chùmō tā zhōuwéi de rén hé wù lái gǎnzhī zìrán shìjiè。
海伦·凯勒通过触摸她周围的人和物来感知自然世界。
They built a triumphal arch to memorialize their victory.
Tāmen jiànle Kǎixuánmén lái jìniàn shènglì。
他们建了凯旋门来纪念胜利。
He sent caesar a force of six thousand men.
Tā pài gěi kǎisà yì zhī liùqiān rén de bùduì。

Tā màochōng Kǎisà de nǚer。
她冒充凯撒的女儿。

那个凯西欧卡看起来又瘦又饿。

Tā zài《kǎisà dàdì》zhōng chūjìng。

Wùzhìcáifù suǒ jīfā de dòngjī bùkěbìmiǎn de yǔ yǒuguān Kǎisà hé Shàngdì de dōngxi jiāozhī zài yìqǐ。
物质财富所激发的动机不可避免地与有关凯撒和上帝的东西交织在一起。
Within three months Eva was champing at the bit.
Sān yuè zhī nèi， Yīwá pō bú nàifán。

Sàlā yǐ tiáozhěng bùfá，yǔ Yīwá bǎochí yízhì。

他对此游刃有余
抓住了这个主要矛盾，一切问题就迎刃而解了。
Zhuāzhù le zhège zhǔyào máodùn，yíqiè wèntí jiù yíngrènérjiě le。
Once this principal contradiction is grasped, all problems can be readily solved.
小王是一位非常优秀的机械师，任何机器问题经过他的手都迎刃而解。
Xiǎo Wáng shì yíwèi fēicháng yōuxiù de jīxièshī，rènhé jīqì wèntí jīngguò tā de shǒu dōu yíngrènérjiě。
Xiao Wang is an excellent mechanic, able to solve any mechanical problem.
迎刃而解
Leaving the country is the best solution to all your problems.
离开这个国家，所有问题都将迎刃而解。
A subtle resource can often solve the seemingly impossible problem.
一个巧妙的办法经常会使那种看起来很难对付的问题迎刃而解。
His problems will come out in the wash.
Tā de wèntí jiānghuì yíngrèn\'érjiě。
他的问题将会迎刃而解。
你把我的刀拿去干什么啦？ 都卷了刃儿了！
Nǐ bǎ wǒ de dāo náqù gàn shénme la? Dōu juǎn le rènr le！
What have you been doing to my knife? The blade\'s all turned.
这把刀刚开刃儿，快极了。
Zhèbǎ dāo gāngkāi rènr，kuàijí le。
This knife has just got its first edge and is extremely sharp.
这刀没刃儿了。
Zhè dāo méi rènr le。
This knife is blunt. or The knife has lost its edge.

xiùrèn

stab to death; kill with one\'s own hand

大家齐心协力制服了这个手持利刃的匪徒。

他总能把钱花在刀刃上。

He always spends his money on vital things.

他深深沉溺于这种幻想当中。
I have this thing where I want to leave everyone behind and roam the wilderness.
Wǒ yìzhí huànxiǎngzhe yǒu yì tiān wǒ yào bǎ suǒyǒurén dōu pāodào nǎo hòu，yí gè rén zài kuàngyě zhōng mànyóu。

Dreams of world domination passed through his mind.
Tā de tóunǎo zhōng yǒuguò tǒngzhì shìjiè de huànxiǎng。
他的头脑中有过统治世界的幻想。
He had this crazy bubble of an idea for world peace.

他怀有世界和平这样一个不切实际的疯狂幻想。
She always has her head in the clouds, daydreaming about being a star.
Tā nǎozi zǒngshì xiǎngzhe búqièshíjì de shì，huànxiǎngzhe néng chéngwéi míngxīng。
她脑子总是想着不切实际的事，幻想着能成为明星。
Catherine uses compensation, fantasy, and displacement as her defense mechanism.
Kǎisèlín yòng dàicháng、 huànxiǎng hé qínggǎn zhuǎnyí zuòwéi tā de fángwèi jīzhì。
凯瑟琳用代偿、幻想和情感转移作为她的防卫机制。
We are not in an ideal world and so I guess it is like a fantasy to them.
Wǒmen méiyǒu shēnchǔ zài yí gè lǐxiǎng de shìjiè，suǒyǐ wǒ rènwéi duì tāmen lái shuō，nà zhǐshì yí gè huànxiǎng。
我们没有身处在一个理想的世界，所以我认为对他们来说，那只是一个幻想。
It turns out it was all smoke and no fire.

结果发现这只是幻想。
He toyed with the idea of holding Eleanor\'s hand and getting romantic.
Tā huànxiǎngzhe wòzhù Āilìnuò de shǒu，yìqǐ zhuìrù ài hé。
他幻想着握住埃莉诺的手，一起坠入爱河。
Her ideas can fairly be described as the intersection of personal and group fantasies.

她的想法完全可以被称作是个人和集体幻想的交集。
New democratic illusions developed among the working masses.

For a short time, he fancied becoming a baseball player.

有一段时间，他幻想能够成为一名篮球运动员。
Winning the lotter is a fool\'s paradise.

彩票中奖是种幻想。
I have no illusions about the scale of this task.

I like to look ahead in imagination to what the future may bring.

我喜欢幻想未来的样子。
This is what I always imagined myself doing in the south of France, sitting idly, drinking coffee, watching the people.

加强宏观经济调控。
Jiāqiánghóngguān jīngjì tiáokòng。
Strengthen macro-economic control.
国家加强了对宏观经济的调控，以确保国民经济稳定发展。
Guójiā jiāqiáng le duì hóngguān jīngjì de tiáokòng，yǐ quèbǎo guómínjīngjì wěndìng fāzhǎn。
The nation has strengthened its control on the macro-economy to ensure the stable development of the national economy.
加强宏观调控。

看到如此宽大宏伟的大教堂时，我站在那惊呆了。
The building was bombastically spacious.
Zhè zuò jiànzhù zhēnshì hóngwěi kuānchǎng。
这座建筑真是宏伟宽敞。
A top-down analysis might begin by looking at macro-economic trends.
Xìzhì de fēnxī kěyǐ cóng chákàn hóngguān jīngjì xíngshì kāishǐ。
细致的分析可以从查看宏观经济形式开始。
Magnanimously, he forgave all those who had harmed him.
Tā kuānhóngdàliàng de yuánliàngle suǒyǒu céngjīng shānghài guò tā de rén。
他宽宏大量地原谅了所有曾经伤害过他的人。
From a macro point of view, we still have an unbalanced global economy.

从宏观层面来看，全球经济仍处于失衡之中。

Wǒmen yào jiāng Zhōnghuá Mínzú de chuántǒng měidé huīhóng guāngdà。
We should carry Chinese traditional virtues forward.

苦心钻研

钻研业务
zuānyán yèwù
diligently study one\'s profession
钻研国际法
zuānyán guójìfǎ 
assiduously study international law
钻研 技术
zuānyán jìshù 
perfect one\'s skill; master technique
交通监理人员要刻苦钻研业务技术。
Jiāotōng jiānlǐ rényuán yào kèkǔ zuānyán yèwù jìshù。
Worker who are monitoring transportation should improve their working skills.
我们应该以那些劳动模范为榜样，认真钻研业务，提高工作水平。
Wǒmen yīnggāi yǐ nàxiē láodòng mófàn wéi bǎngyàng，rènzhēn zuānyán yèwù，tígāo gōngzuò shuǐpíng。
We should follow the good example of those model workers, endeavour to gain professional proficiency, and increase work capability.
科研工作需要钻劲，不能突击。
Kēyán gōngzuò xūyào zuānjìn，bùnéng tūjī。
Scientific research demands close application rather than spurts of effort.

钻研。

传统的对联要求上下两句完全对仗。
Chuántǒng de duìlián yāoqiú shàngxià liǎngjù wánquán duìzhàng。
In traditional antithetical couplets, the two parts are strictly antithetical.
这句话运用了对仗的修辞方法。
Zhèjùhuà yùnyòng le duìzhàng de xiūcí fāngfǎ。
The passage employs a figure of speech called parallelism.
他是一位打过恶仗的英雄。
Tā shì yíwèi dǎ guò èzhàng de yīngxióng。
He is a hero who has gone through many fierce battles.
上次考试没考好，这次我一定要打个翻身仗。

People cheered when the  guard of honor walked past the  platform.
为了点儿小事你俩就干仗？

Zhèshǒushī duìzhàng gōngwěn。
The antithesis in this poem is well done.

Háizimen dōu xǐhuan bùtíng de jīshuǐ dǎshuǐzhàng。
Children all like splashing and fighting with water.
小时候咱们一起玩过打仗游戏，你可曾记得？
Xiǎoshíhou zánmen yìqǐ wánguò dǎzhàng yóuxì，nǐ kě céng jìde？
Do you remember the war games that we used to play together when we were little?
他是个老革命，讲起当年打仗的事总是有说不完的话。
Tā shì gè lǎogémìng，jiǎngqǐ dāngnián dǎzhàng de shì zǒngshì yǒu shuōbùwán de huà。
He is a veteran revolutionary cadre and has endless stories of war.
古时候，国家一打仗就要抓老百姓当民夫。
Gǔshíhou，guójiā yì dǎzhàng jiùyào zhuā lǎobǎixìng dāng mínfū。
In ancient times when a nation was at war, civilians would be captured and become conscripted labourers.
为这么点儿小矛盾就拿刀动仗的，太不应该了！
Wéi zhème diǎnr xiǎo máodùn jiù nádāo dòngzhàng de，tài bùyīnggāi le！
It was very inappropriate to fight over such a trivial conflict.
玩儿过打仗游戏之后，这群孩子全都满身泥污了。
Wánr guò dǎzhàng yóuxì zhīhòu，zhè qún háizi quándōu mǎnshēn níwū le。
After the play battle, the crowd of children were all covered in mud.
写对联时要注意排偶对仗。
Xiě duìlián shí yào zhùyì páiǒu duìzhàng。
When you write a couplet, pay attention to antithetic parallelism and antithesis.
你不要依仗你父亲的职权势力对百姓强取豪夺。
Nǐ búyào yīzhàng nǐ fùqīn de zhíquán shìlì duì bǎixìng qiángqǔ háoduó。
Don’t take the advantage of your father\'s authority and force to take things from common people by force.
这个权门弟子经常仗势欺人。
Zhège quánmén dìzǐ jīngcháng zhàngshì qīrén。
This man, who is from a family of an influential official, often takes advantage of his family to bully people.
这座城池的守兵都被调往前线打仗去了。
Zhèzuò chéngchí de shǒubīng dōu bèi diàowǎng qiánxiàn dǎzhàng qù le。
The armed guards of this city have all been transferred to the front lines to fight.
仪仗队已经整整齐齐的排在了广场上，等待受检。
Yízhàngduì yǐjing zhěngzhěngqíqí de páizài le guǎngchǎng shàng，děngdài shòujiǎn。
The honor guards are in ordered lines in the square, waiting for review.
小张对朋友一向很仗义，他认为“珠宝有价，友情无价”。
Xiǎo Zhāng duì péngyou yí xiàng hěn zhàngyì，tā rènwéi“zhūbǎo yǒujià，yǒuqíng wú jià”。
Xiao Zhang is always ready to help his friends in the belief that &quot;pearls and treasures have their prices, but friendship is priceless&quot;.
打仗的时候，小钢炮也可以发挥大作用。
Dǎzhàng de shíhou，Xiǎogāngpào yě kěyǐ fāhuī dàzuòyòng。
Small modern steel cannon are very useful in battles.
小王是个行侠仗义的人，从来不惧熊罴。
Xiǎo Wáng shì gè xíngxiá zhàngyì de rén，cónglái bùjù xióngpí。
Xiao Wang is a knightly man who is never afraid of evil force.
打仗的时候我们需要野战军的支持。
Dǎzhàng de shíhou wǒmen xūyào yězhànjūn de zhīchí。
We need the support of the field army when we are in field operations.
这些马匹是用来打仗的，不能随便役用。
Zhèxiē mǎpǐ shì yònglái dǎzhàng de，bùnéng suíbiàn yìyòng。
The horse is a war horse, it can\'t be used as a work horse.
前去讨薪的时候他叫上哥哥为他仗胆。
Qiánqù tǎoxīn de shíhou tā jiào shàng gēge wèi tā zhàngdǎn。
When asking for the salary, he took his older brother with him to boost his courage.
某些干部子女仗势欺人，在学校欺负同班同学。
Mǒuxiē gànbùzǐnǚ zhàngshì qīrén，zài xuéxiào qīfu tóngbān tóngxué。
Some cadres\' children take advantage of their parents\' power to bully their classmates at school.
她仗着和老总的关系，在公司里面专擅、目中无人。
Tā zhàng zhe hé lǎozǒng de guānxì，zài gōngsī lǐmiàn zhuānshàn、mù zhōng wúrén。
Relying on her relationship with the boss, she acted without authorization and looked down her nose at everybody.
这位将军从未打过败仗。
Zhèwèi jiāngjūn cóngwèi dǎguò bàizhàng。
This general has never suffered defeat.

It\'s better not to go there, it\'s still a country at war.
最好别去那儿，那个国家还在打仗。
The children are playing a soldier game.
孩子们在玩儿打仗的游戏。
Her husband is fighting at the front.
她的丈夫在前线打仗。
Superior numbers are not always enough in a battle.
打胜仗不仅仅靠人多。
Having spent years fighting them, Karl could recognize a Russian soldier from a mile away.
Gēn tāmen dǎle zhème duō nián de zhàng，Kǎ\'ěr dōunéng zài yì gōnglǐ zhīwài rènchū Éguóbīng lái le。
跟他们打了这么多年的仗，卡尔都能在一公里之外认出俄国兵来了。
The lord dictated to them and treated them like slaves.
Zhège jūnzhǔ yīzhàng quánshì yāpò tāmen，duìdài tāmen xiàng núlì yìbān。
这个君主依仗权势压迫他们，对待他们像奴隶一般。
Blair lied about the reasons for going to war.
Bùlái\'ěr yǐnmán le chūzhēng qù dǎzhàng de lǐyóu。
布莱尔隐瞒了出征去打仗的理由。
The battle against the huge empire was a lost cause.
Yǔ pángdà de dìguó zuòzhàn shì zhùdìng yào chī bàizhàng de。
与庞大的帝国作战是注定要吃败仗的。
Few women have led troops in battle.
Hěnshǎo yǒu nǚxìng zài zhànzhēng zhōng shuài jūn dǎzhàng。
很少有女性在战争中率军打仗。
The war of words between them de-escalated with time.
Suízhe shíjiān de yánxù，tāmen de kǒushuǐ zhàng jiànjiàn jiàngjí le。
随着时间的延续，他们的口水仗渐渐降级了。
Troops accoutered for battle.
Bùduì kāishǐ fāfàng zhuāngbèi，zhǔnbèi dǎzhàng。

They pelted each other with snowballs.

Wèile diǎnr xiǎoshì nǐ liǎ jiù gànzhàng?

这事我一人干不了，全仗大家帮忙。
Zhè shì wǒ yì rén gàn bu liǎo，quán zhàngdàjiā bāngmáng。

这一仗打得干净利落。

Tā shì yíwèi dǎ guò èzhàng de yīngxióng。

传统的对联要求上下两句完全对仗。
Chuántǒng de duìlián yāoqiú shàngxià liǎngjù wánquán duìzhàng。
In traditional antithetical couplets, the two parts are strictly antithetical.
这句话运用了对仗的修辞方法。
Zhèjùhuà yùnyòng le duìzhàng de xiūcí fāngfǎ。
The passage employs a figure of speech called parallelism.
这首诗对仗工稳。
Zhèshǒushī duìzhàng gōngwěn。
The antithesis in this poem is well done.
写对联时要注意排偶对仗。
Xiě duìlián shí yào zhùyì páiǒu duìzhàng。
When you write a couplet, pay attention to antithetic parallelism and antithesis.
小张对朋友一向很仗义，他认为“珠宝有价，友情无价”。
Xiǎo Zhāng duì péngyou yí xiàng hěn zhàngyì，tā rènwéi“zhūbǎo yǒujià，yǒuqíng wú jià”。
Xiao Zhang is always ready to help his friends in the belief that &quot;pearls and treasures have their prices, but friendship is priceless&quot;.
你不要依仗你父亲的职权势力对百姓强取豪夺。

lǐng bīng dǎzhàng
lead troops into battle
小时候咱们一起玩过打仗游戏，你可曾记得？
Xiǎoshíhou zánmen yìqǐ wánguò dǎzhàng yóuxì，nǐ kě céng jìde？
Do you remember the war games that we used to play together when we were little?
他是个老革命，讲起当年打仗的事总是有说不完的话。
Tā shì gè lǎogémìng，jiǎngqǐ dāngnián dǎzhàng de shì zǒngshì yǒu shuōbùwán de huà。
He is a veteran revolutionary cadre and has endless stories of war.
古时候，国家一打仗就要抓老百姓当民夫。
Gǔshíhou，guójiā yì dǎzhàng jiùyào zhuā lǎobǎixìng dāng mínfū。

three-way cock
旋踵即逝
xuánzhǒng jíshì
vanish before one has time to turn round; disappear in the twinkling of an eye
顺时针方向旋转
shùnshízhēn fāngxiàng xuánzhuǎn
clockwise rotation
逆时针方向旋转
nìshízhēn fāngxiàng xuánzhuǎn
counterclockwise rotation
旋转球
xuánzhuǎnqiú
a spinning ball
旋根车轴
xuángēn chēzhóu
shape a piece of steel into an axle on a lathe
给孩子旋一个苹果吃。
Gěi háizi xuán yígè píngguǒ chī。
Peel an apple for the child.
右旋物质
yòuxuán wùzhì 
dextrorotatory substance
游击队长期在山区和侵略者周旋。
Yóujīduì chángqī zài shānqū hé qīnlüèzhě zhōuxuán。
For a long time, the guerrillas fought the invaders in hilly country.
旋转自如
xuánzhuǎn zìrú 
rotate or revolve freely
旋转钻机
xuánzhuǎn zuànjī 
rotary rig
旋绕
xuánrào
curl up; wind around
凯旋
kǎixuán
triumphant return
这个旋律太过沉缓了。
Zhège xuánlǜ tài guò chénhuǎn le。
The rhythm is much too steady and slow.
落叶在风中不停的打旋。
Luòyè zài fēng zhōng bùtíng de dǎxuán。
The fallen leaves turn round and round in the wind.
一个陀螺在滴溜儿地旋转着。
Yígè tuóluó zài dīliūr de xuánzhuǎn zhe。
A top is spinning very fast.
那天我去听了音乐会，动听的旋律至今回响在耳际。
Nàtiān wǒ qù tīng le yīnlèhuì，dòngtīng de xuánlǜ zhìjīn huíxiǎng zài ěrjì。
On that day I went to the concert , and the beautiful melody  lingers on even today.
舞蹈演员飞旋的舞姿轻盈美妙。
Wǔdǎo yǎnyuán fēixuán de wǔzī qīngyíng měimiào。
The dancer whirls gracefully.
他的后脑勺儿上长了一个旋儿。
Tā de hòunǎosháor shàng zhǎng le yígè xuánr。
There is a circle on the raised part of his hindbrain.
这部交响乐作品采用了回旋曲式。
Zhèbù jiāoxiǎngyuè zuòpǐn cǎiyòng le huíxuán qǔshì。
Rondo is used in this symphony.
把那把螺旋铰刀给我拿过来。
Bǎ nàbǎ luóxuán jiǎodāo gěi wǒ náguòlái。
Pass me that reamer for making spirals.
我们唱支劲曲来欢迎凯旋的队伍吧。
Wǒmen chàng zhī jìnqǔ lái huānyíng kǎixuán de duìwu ba。
Let\'s welcome the victorious army with a powerful song.
昆曲的旋律很柔软。
Kūnqǔ de xuánlǜ hěnróuruǎn。
Kunqu has a soft and tender melody.
这只老雕为什么总在这上空盘旋呢？
Zhèzhī lǎodiāo wèishénme zǒng zài zhè shàngkōng pánxuán ne？
Why does the vulture always hover in the sky here?
在与老奸巨猾的骗子进行周旋时，所需要的不仅仅是才智还要有勇敢和镇定。
Zài yǔ lǎojiān jùhuá de piànzi jìnxíng zhōuxuán shí，suǒ xūyào de bùjǐnjǐn shì cáizhì háiyào yǒu yǒnggǎn hé zhèndìng。
When struggling with wily cheaters, we need not only ability and wisdom but also boldness and equanimity.
这架飞机的螺旋桨出了点问题，正在维修。
Zhè jià fēijī de luóxuánjiǎng chū le diǎn wèntí，zhèngzài wéixiū。
The propeller of the plane is out of order, and is under repair.
螺旋藻有减肥的作用，受到许多女士的欢迎。
Luóxuánzǎo yǒu jiǎnféi de zuòyòng，shòudào xǔduō nǚshì de huānyíng。
Spiral alga has a slimming effect, it is popular with many women.
学这个舞蹈时，我总是记不住这两个逆时针旋转动作！
Xué zhège wǔdǎo shí，wǒ zǒngshì jìbúzhù zhè liǎnggè nìshízhēn xuánzhuǎn dòngzuò！
When I was learning the dance, I always couldn\'t remember the two counterclockwise rotation movements.
他们旋即离开那里，避免了一场冲突。
Tāmen xuánjí líkāi nàlǐ，bìmiǎn le yìcháng chōngtū。
They left there soon after, thus avoided a conflict.
狂风旋卷着大量的沙尘呼啸而过，路人纷纷闭上了眼睛。
Kuángfēng xuánjuǎn zhe dàliàng de shāchén hūxiào érguò，lùrén fēnfēn bìshàng le yǎnjīng。
The strong wind howled past with a lot of sand in it, which forces pedestrians to shut their eyes one after another.
现在这里的装修采用的是旋梯，很有新意。
Xiànzài zhèlǐ de zhuāngxiū cǎiyòng de shì xuántī，hěn yǒu xīnyì。
Now people use winding stairs here in decoration work, which is quite a fresh idea.
旋梯比赛就要开始了，你别走了。
Xuántī bǐsài jiùyào kāishǐ le，nǐ bié zǒu le。
The winding stairs competition will begin right away, don\'t go.
雪在空中旋舞，好像有了灵性。
Xuě zài kōng zhōng xuánwǔ，hǎo xiàng yǒu le líng xìng。
The snow is whirling and wheeling in the sky, as if it is bestowed with some spirit.
温酒的旋子掉了，你再去换一个吧。
Wēnjiǔ de xuànzi diào le，nǐ zài qù huàn yígè ba。
The tool which was used for warming the wine was lost. Would you get another one, please?
我们用旋子做的粉皮，你尝尝。
Wǒmen yòng xuànzi zuò de fěnpí，nǐ chángcháng。
This is the sheet jelly we made by our equipment. Come and taste it!
小朋友在玩旋子，开心极了。
Xiǎopéngyou zài wán xuànzi，kāixīn jí le。
The children are playing peg-tops happily.
他表演了旋子，赢得喝彩声一片。
Tā biǎoyǎn le xuànzi，yíngdé hècǎishēng yí piàn。
His performance in somersaults won a good round of applause.
她陶醉在坠琴的优美旋律中。

She was intoxicated by the beautiful tunes of the zhuiqin, a kind of bowed instrument.
由此可见，地球是绕着太阳不停地旋转的。
Yóucǐ kějiàn，dìqiú shì rào zhe tàiyáng bùtíng de xuánzhuàn de。

pánxuán
wind

她面色苍白，看来是生病了。

吓得苍白的脸

我脸色很苍白，所以人们总是认为我很丑。

他高尚的品格好比苍松翠柏，万古长青。

Like pines and cypresses, his qualities are forever great.

He looks aged, because he has worked hard for years and years.

The vast sea is limitless, it\'s really magnificent.

Meeting with him after several years and seeing his old and wizened appearance reveals the hardships he\'s had over the years.

Xióngyīng zài cāngkōng fēixiáng。
The eagle is flying up in the blue sky.

重荷
zhònghè
heavy burden; heavy responsibilities
“接天莲叶无穷碧，映日荷花别样红”。
“Jiētiān liányè wúqióngbì，yìngrì héhuā biéyànghóng”。
The green lotus leaves stretch to the horizon, and the lotus looks extremely bright under the sunshine.
这类食品中添加了薄荷脑。
Zhè lèi shípǐn zhōng tiānjiā le bòhenǎo。
Menthol is one of the ingredients of this kind of food.
牙膏中的薄荷油使人感觉到清凉。

The menthol in the toothpaste gives a cooling sensation.
《荷塘香远》是一幅巨型彩墨画。
《Hétángxiāngyuǎn》 shì yìfú jùxíng cǎimòhuà。
“The fragrance of the lotus pond” is a large ink and color painting.
“荷叶粉蒸肉”是一道杭州名菜。

我喜欢独自欣赏荷塘的月色。

I like enjoying the moonlight beside a lotus pond.
我饿极了，一连吃了三个荷叶饼。

The lotus pond is bottle-green and pink in color, and is full of poetic luster.

Long hours\' tense work almost drove me mad.
再这样超负荷地工作下去，你早晚是要躺倒的。

在物理上，中性物体是指不带电荷的物体。

zhèng（fù）diànhè
positive (negative) charge
同种电荷互相排斥。
Tóngzhǒng diànhè hùxiāngpáichì。
Two like electric charges repel one another.
化学元素是具有相同核电荷数的同一类原子的总称。
Huàxuéyuánsù shì jùyǒu xiāngtóng hédiànhèshù de tóng yílèi yuánzǐ de zǒngchēng。
Chemical element is the general term for the same type of atoms with the same mass number.
The plate is impressed with a positive charge so that it may flow electrons.
Yángjí dàiyǒu zhèngdiànhé，zhèyàng jiù néng shǐ diànzǐ liúdòng le。
阳极带有正电荷，这样就能使电子流动了。
an electrical charge
一个电荷
In physics, a neutral object is one that is not charged with electricity.
在物理上，中性物体是指不带电荷的物体。
Those molecules themselves are composed of smaller particles that have positive and negative charges of electricity.
那些分子本身是由若干更小的带有正负电荷的微粒所组成的。
There are two kinds of electric charge, positive and negative.
Diànhè yǒu liǎng zhǒng，zhèng de hé fù de。
电荷有两种，正的和负的。
Because this capacitor is not perfect，the charge gradually leaks away.
Yīnwèi zhège diànróngqì bìng bù jīngzhǔn，suǒyǐ diànhè zhújiàn liúshī。
因为这个电容器并不精准，所以电荷逐渐流失。
The charge density varies from point to point.
Diǎn yǔ diǎn zhījiān de diànhè mìdù bù tóng。
点与点之间的电荷密度不同。
超负荷
chāo fùhè
overload
南京长江大桥公路桥已超负荷，阻车现象经常发生。
NánjīngChángJiāngdàqiáo gōnglùqiáo yǐ chāo fùhè，zǔchē xiàn xàngjīngchángfāshēng。
Traffic jams are frequent on the Nanjing Yangtze Bridge because of its overload.
再这样超负荷地工作下去，你早晚是要躺倒的。
Zài zhèyàng chāo fùhè de gōngzuò xiàqù，nǐ zǎowǎn shì yào tǎngdǎo de。
If you continue to work excessively, you will sooner or later make yourself ill.
超负荷运转
中小学生课业超负荷现象正在扭转
The whole machine will be overburdened without the attachment.
没有这个附加装置，整个机器就会超负荷。
We can adjust the power to lighten the overburdened reactor.
我们可以调节能量来减轻超负荷的反应堆
The two workers carried the load by turns.
Zhè liǎng gè gōngrén lúnliú chāofùhè gōngzuò。
这两个工人轮流超负荷工作。
Heavy traffic overloaded the trunk lines.
Fánmáng de jiāotōng ràng zhǔgàndào chāo fùhè yùnxíng。
繁忙的交通让主干道超负荷运行。
The aerator overloaded.
Gǔfēngjī zài chāofùhè yùnzhuǎn。
鼓风机在超负荷运转。
He kicked it on high and attacked his workload.
Tā tūrán kāishǐ chāogāo fùhè de gōngzuò。
他突然开始超高负荷地工作。
The system broke down under excessive loads.
Xìtǒng yīn chāochū fùhèliàng ér chūxiàn gùzhàng。
系统因超出负荷量而出现故障。
牙膏中的薄荷油使人感觉到清凉。
Yágāo zhōng de bòheyóu shǐ rén gǎnjué dào qīngliáng。
The menthol in the toothpaste gives a cooling sensation.
这类食品中添加了薄荷脑。
Zhè lèi shípǐn zhōng tiānjiā le bòhenǎo。

I love peppermint ice cream too.
我也酷爱薄荷冰激凌。

他在一只高脚杯子中加了糖、薄荷和一点苏打水。

There\'s this lady in Iowa.
那就是来自爱荷华州的女士。
The Twin River is located in Idaho.

yǎnmái shīshǒu

Some ancient towns in the Middle East are buried in desert sands.

The villages are buried under snow in the valleys.

fire cover

(artillery) fire cover

Yóujīduì lìyòng qīngshāzhàng zuò yǎnhù。
The guerrillas used the green curtain of tall crops as cover.
他这样做，实际上是给他上司打掩护。

In so doing, he was actually trying to shield his boss.
他用机关枪不停地扫射，掩护自己的战友。
Tā yòng jīguānqiāng bùtíng de sǎoshè，yǎnhù zìjǐ de zhànyǒu。
He kept on shooting with his machine gun, covering his battle companions.
连长在冲锋枪的掩护下冲到了敌人的碉堡下面。

to take cover
掩护，掩蔽
air umbrella
空中掩护幕

under cover of darkness
在黑夜的掩护下
He was hidden under the cloak of darkness.
Tā zài yèmù de yǎnhù xià yǐnbìzhe。
他在夜幕的掩护下隐蔽着。
Philip stepped back quickly into the cover of the trees.
Fēilìpǔ hěn kuài tuìhuí dào shùlín de yǎnhù lǐ。
菲利浦很快退回到树林的掩护里。

他们的六个同犯在火的掩护下逃走了。

Tā yòngle bié de xìng，zuòwéi zhè cì rènwù de yǎnhù。
他用了别的姓，作为这次任务的掩护。
The defenders are huddling down for cover.
Hànwèizhě wèile yǎnhù suōchéngyìtuán。
捍卫者为了掩护缩成一团。
They had hurried for cover when they had seen the black sky approaching.
Tāmen kànjiàn hēisè de tiānmù pòjìn de shíhou，gǎnjǐn xúnzhǎo yǎnhù，
他们看见黑色的天幕迫近的时候，赶紧寻找掩护，
The actual emergence usually takes place under cover of darkness.

实际上紧急情况通常都在黑暗的掩护下发生。
He was called for setting an illegal pick.
Tā yóuyú yǎnhù fànguī bèi jiàofá。
他由于掩护犯规被叫罚。
Her new name and passport are cover for her next assignment.
Tā de xīn míngzi hé hùzhào shì yònglái wèi tā xià yí xiàng shǐmìng dǎyǎnhù de。
她的新名字和护照是用来为她下一项使命打掩护的。
Smith covered again.
Shǐmìsī yòu dǎle yí cì yǎnhù。
史密斯又打了一次掩护。

Yǎnhùwù shǐ tāmen de qiāngzhī duǒ guò le díjī de zhēnchá。
掩护物使他们的枪支躲过了敌机的侦察。
墨写的谎言掩盖不了血写的事实。

Lies written in ink cannot cover up facts recorded in blood.
任何狡辩都不能掩盖事实真相。

No amount of sophistry can cover up the truth.
企图掩盖事实
qǐtú yǎn\'gài shìshí
try to conceal the facts
千方百计掩盖错误
qiānfāngbǎijì yǎngài cuòwù
use all one\'s ingenuity to cover up one\'s mistakes
要注意一种倾向有可能掩盖另一种倾向。
Yào zhùyì yìzhǒng qīng xiàng yǒu kěnéng yǎngài lìng yìzhǒng qīng xiàng。
One must be alive to the possibility that one tendency may conceal another.
大雪掩盖着田野。
Dàxuě yǎngài zhe tiányě。
The fields were covered with snow.
谎言掩盖不了事实。
Huǎngyán yǎngài bùliǎo shìshí。
Lies cannot cover up (or conceal) the facts.
掩盖真相
yǎngài zhēn xiàng 
cover up the facts

一个掩盖了早期失败的成功

掩盖种种罪恶
The accounts were juggled to hide the losses.

为了掩盖损失，这些账目被篡改了。
He had a deceptively casual acting style that hid the effort he put into each role.
Tā yǒu yì zhǒng qīpiànxìng de zìrán suíyì de biǎoyǎn fāngshì，zhè yǎngàile tā zài měi gè juésè shàng fùchū de xīnxuè。

对他们来说最好就是掩盖真相。

千方百计掩盖错误
qiānfāngbǎijì yǎngài cuòwù
use all one\'s ingenuity to cover up one\'s mistakes
游击队利用青纱帐作掩护。
Yóujīduì lìyòng qīngshāzhàng zuò yǎnhù。
The guerrillas used the green curtain of tall crops as cover.
要注意一种倾向有可能掩盖另一种倾向。
Yào zhùyì yìzhǒng qīng xiàng yǒu kěnéng yǎngài lìng yìzhǒng qīng xiàng。
One must be alive to the possibility that one tendency may conceal another.
掩口而笑
yǎnkǒu ér xiào
hide one\'s smile
掩鼻而过
yǎnbí ér guò
pass by (sth. nauseating) holding one\'s nose
掩卷
yǎnjuàn
close a book
虚掩着门
xūyǎn zhe mén
with the door left unlocked or unlatched
小心门掩了手。
Xiǎoxīn mén yǎn le shǒu。
Don\'t get your fingers caught in the door.
掩袭
yǎnxí
launch a surprise attack
高射炮上有树枝掩蔽着。
Gāoshèpào shàngyǒu shùzhī yǎnbì zhe。
The antiaircraft guns were camouflaged with tree branches.
大雪掩盖着田野。
Dàxuě yǎngài zhe tiányě。
The fields were covered with snow.
谎言掩盖不了事实。
Huǎngyán yǎngài bùliǎo shìshí。
Lies cannot cover up (or conceal) the facts.
他这样做，实际上是给他上司打掩护。
Tā zhèyàngzuò，shíjìshàngshì gěi tā shàngsi dǎ yǎnhù。
In so doing, he was actually trying to shield his boss.
掩埋尸首
yǎnmái shīshǒu
bury a corpse
掩饰错误
yǎnshì cuòwù
gloss over (or cover up) one\'s mistakes
掩饰真实的意图
yǎnshì zhēnshí de yìtú
conceal one\'s true intentions
炮兵掩体
pàobīngyǎntǐ
emplacement
月掩星
yuè yǎn xīnɡ
lunar occultation
红楼翠竹交相掩映。
Hónglóu cuìzhú jiāoxiāngyǎnyìng。
The red buildings and green bamboos set each other off.
远山被云雾遮掩着。
Yuǎnshān bèi yúnwù zhēyǎn zhe。
The distant hills were enveloped in clouds and mist.
掩盖真相
yǎngài zhēn xiàng 
cover up the facts
瑕不掩瑜
xiábùyǎnyú
one flaw cannot mar the jade—small defects cannot obscure great virtues
遇事要冷静，正所谓“兵来将挡，水来土掩”。
Yùshì yào lěngjìng，zhèng suǒwèi“bīnglái jiàngdǎng，shuǐlái tǔyǎn”。
One has to be calm when facing all kinds of situations, as the saying goes “counter measure for measure”.
此地青山掩映，苍翠欲滴。
Cǐdì qīngshān yǎnyìng，cāngcuì yùdī。
There are many green mountains in this area, everywhere you see is green.
这座小城掩映在一片苍山翠柏之中。
Zhèzuò xiǎochéng yǎnyìng zài yípiàn cāngshān cuìbǎi zhī zhōng。
This small city and the stretch of bluish green cypresses set each other off.
他用机关枪不停地扫射，掩护自己的战友。
Tā yòng jīguānqiāng bùtíng de sǎoshè，yǎnhù zìjǐ de zhànyǒu。
He kept on shooting with his machine gun, covering his battle companions.
为了掩盖自己的罪行，他不惜杀人灭口。
Wèile yǎngài zìjǐ de zuìxíng，tā bùxī shārénmièkǒu。
He didn\'t hesitate to kill the witness to cover up the crime.
他一直将自己的行藏掩藏得很好。
Tā yìzhí jiāng zìjǐ de xíngcáng yǎncáng de hěn hǎo。
He has been hiding his whereabouts very well.
把门虚掩着就可以啦，我马上回来！
Bǎ mén xūyǎnzhe jiù kěyǐ la，wǒ mǎshàng huílái！
Just leave the door unlocked. I will come back soon.
下水道堵了，人们都掩鼻而走。
Xiàshuǐdào dǔ le，rénmén dōu yǎnbí érzǒu。
The sewer is blocked; people passing by hold their breath.
公司规定下班后要掩闭门窗。
Gōngsī guīdìng xiàbān hòu yào yǎnbì ménchuāng。
Under the regulations of the company, doors and windows should be closed after knock-off.
战争年代我们把伤病员藏在掩蔽部。
Zhànzhēng niándài wǒmen bǎ shāngbìngyuán cángzài yǎnbìbù。
We hid our patients in the shelter during the war.
他一下子坐在地上，掩面而泣。
Tā yíxiàzi zuòzài dìshàng，yǎnmiàn érqì。
He sat down on the ground all of a sudden, covered his face with his hands and started weeping.
看着座车缓缓进站，他掩饰不住自己激动的心情。
Kàn zhe zuòchē huǎnhuǎn jìnzhàn，tā yǎnshì búzhù zìjǐ jīdòng de xīnqíng。
He can not conceal his excitement at the gradual pulling-in of the passenger train.
连长在冲锋枪的掩护下冲到了敌人的碉堡下面。
Liánzhǎng zài chōngfēngqiāng de yǎnhù xià chōngdào le dírén de diāobǎo xiàmiàn。
Under submachine gun cover, the company commander rushed forward to the foot of the enemy\'s blockhouse.
从他的闪烁其词能看出他分明是在掩饰什么。
Cóng tā de shǎnshuòqící néng kànchū tā fēnmíng shì zài yǎnshì shénme。
You can tell from his evasive language that he\'s got something to hide.
掩饰不住内心的喜悦
Yǎnshìbúzhù nèixīn de xǐyuè
be unable to hide one\'s happiness
她的缺点和优点相比可以说是瑕不掩瑜。
tā de quēdiǎn hé yōudiǎn xiāngbǐ kěyǐshuō shì xiábùyǎnyú。
On balance, her strong points more than make up for her weaknesses.
陷阱用树枝掩盖起来。
Xiànjǐng yòng shùzhī yǎngài qǐlái。
The trap is covered with tree branches.
屋子被门帘遮掩着。
Wūzi bèi ménlián zhēyǎnzhe。
The room is obscured by a door curtain.
知错就改，不要遮遮掩掩的。
掩阍
不以一眚掩大德。

掩护主力撤退
掩卷沉思

掩人耳目
不要粉饰现实，掩盖矛盾

掩饰窘态。
为了掩人耳目，他们还演出了一场闹剧。
防止一种倾向掩盖另一种倾向。
这些所谓的和平论调，都是掩盖其侵略实质的烟幕。

队伍掩蔽在一条山梁背后。
一片空旷地，任何掩蔽都没有。
掩藏秘密文件。
把心事掩藏起来。
用树枝把陷阱掩盖起来。
掩盖事实真相。
掩护地下工作者。
你们在这儿截击敌人，掩护大部队安全转移。
以青纱帐为掩护。
掩埋烈士尸骨。
把一包机密文件掩埋在墙角下。
有苦难言，掩泣不已。
掩饰罪责。
掩饰真实意图。
单人掩体。
机枪掩体。
楼台亭阁掩映在青松翠柏之中。
茂密的林木遮掩了山村。
to take cover
掩护，掩蔽
he\'s rather hazy about the details
他对细节有点遮遮掩掩
The door stood ajar.
门半开半掩着。
the bald facts
毫不掩饰的事实
stating the unpleasant facts barely
不加掩饰地，陈述令人不快的事实
His smile belies his anger.
他的笑容掩饰他的愤怒情绪。
disguise an emotion
掩饰感情
dissemble fear by smiling
用笑来掩饰恐惧
hard base
有坚固掩体的基地
a success that obscured earlier failures
一个掩盖了早期失败的成功
air umbrella
空中掩护幕
A thin thread of first light made its way through the half-open door.
清晨的第一道光线从虚掩的门射了进来。
Please don\'t play the race card to cover up the real concerns people have.
请不要打出民族主义这张牌，来掩盖人们真正关心的东西。
He covered his face with his hands and started to cry.
他掩面哭泣。
He claims the federal government is doing all it can to cover up what really happened.
他声称，联邦政府正在竭尽全力掩盖事实真相。
They tried to cover up their mistakes.
他们企图掩盖错误。
The military says this place is used as cover for cross-border rocket attacks.
军方称这个地方是用来掩护边界的导弹袭击。
to bury one\'s face in one\'s hands
双手掩面
under cover of darkness
在黑夜的掩护下
The right style of swimsuit can help by hiding bulges.
款式适当的游泳衣有助于掩饰肥胖部位。
to cover {or} hide a multitude of sins
掩盖种种罪恶
Some ancient towns in the Middle East are buried in desert sands.
一些中东的古城被沙漠的黄沙掩埋了。
She couldn\'t conceal her envy of my success.
她掩饰不了对我成功的嫉妒。
The accounts were juggled to hide the losses.
Wèile yǎngài sǔnshī，zhèxiē zhàngmù bèi cuàngǎi le。
为了掩盖损失，这些账目被篡改了。
He was too tired to disguise his lack of interest.
Tā lǎn de yǎnshì tā de bù gǎnxìngqù。
他懒得掩饰他的不感兴趣。
His head was bowed, his hands covering his eyes.
Tā dīxiàle tóu，shuāngshǒu yǎnmiàn。
他低下了头，双手掩面。
The villages are buried under snow in the valleys.
Shāngǔ zhōng de cūnzhuāng bèi dàxuě yǎnmái。
山谷中的村庄被大雪掩埋。
He had a deceptively casual acting style that hid the effort he put into each role.
Tā yǒu yì zhǒng qīpiànxìng de zìrán suíyì de biǎoyǎn fāngshì，zhè yǎngàile tā zài měi gè juésè shàng fùchū de xīnxuè。
他有一种欺骗性的自然随意的表演方式，这掩盖了他在每个角色上付出的心血。
He was hidden under the cloak of darkness.
Tā zài yèmù de yǎnhù xià yǐnbìzhe。
他在夜幕的掩护下隐蔽着。
She cloaked her embarrassment at seeing him by rushing into speech.
Tā tūrán kāishǐ jiǎnghuà，jiècǐ lái yǎnshì kàndào tā shí de gāngà。
她突然开始讲话，借此来掩饰看到他时的尴尬。
It was almost concealed by the small columns which held up the roof.
Tā jīhū bèi zhīchēng wūdǐng de jǐ gēn xiǎozhùzi zhēyǎn zhù le。
它几乎被支撑屋顶的几根小柱子遮掩住了。
Her make-up couldn\'t conceal the tearstains on her face.
Tā de zhuāng yě wúfǎ yǎnshì tā liǎn shàng de lèihén。
她的妆也无法掩饰她脸上的泪痕。
Philip stepped back quickly into the cover of the trees.
Fēilìpǔ hěn kuài tuìhuí dào shùlín de yǎnhù lǐ。
菲利浦很快退回到树林的掩护里。
Their six accomplices escaped under the cover of fire.
Tāmen de liù gè tóngfàn zài huǒ de yǎnhù xià táozǒu le。
他们的六个同犯在火的掩护下逃走了。
He took a different surname as part of his cover for the mission.
Tā yòngle bié de xìng，zuòwéi zhè cì rènwù de yǎnhù。
他用了别的姓，作为这次任务的掩护。
It would be in their best interest to cover up the truth.
Duì tāmen láishuō zuìhǎo jiùshì yǎngài zhēnxiàng。
对他们来说最好就是掩盖真相。
His technical command of artistic processes never obscured his sense of humour.
Tā yìshù bān shúliàn de zhǐhuī guòchéng cónglái méiyǒu yǎngài tā de yōumògǎn。
他艺术般熟练的指挥过程从来没有掩盖他的幽默感。
Mr Smith hid his anger under a mask of happiness.
Shǐmìsī xiānsheng yòng gāoxìng yǎnshì tā de fènnù。
史密斯先生用高兴掩饰他的愤怒。
She refuses to mask her real face behind imagery.
Tā jùjué yǎnshì tā xíngxiàng hòumiàn de zhēnshí liǎnmiàn。
她拒绝掩饰她形象后面的真实脸面。
She said her answer in a light voice to mask the shock.
Tā qīngshēng huídá，yǐ yǎnshì tā de zhènjīng。
她轻声回答，以掩饰她的震惊。
Sarah buried her face in her hands to hide her misery.
Shālā yòng shuāngshǒu wǔzhù liǎn，yǎnshìzhe tā de tòngkǔ。
莎拉用双手捂住脸，掩饰着她的痛苦。
He didn\'t even try to hide the excitement in his voice.
Tā de shēngyīn shènzhì méiyǒu yǎnshì tā de jīdòng。
他的声音甚至没有掩饰他的激动。
These children had no problem in expressing their greed.
Zhèxiē háizi háobù yǎnshì de biǎodá chū tānlán。
这些孩子毫不掩饰地表达出贪婪。
Unfortunately most of the extra cash grabbed was swallowed up by bad debts.
Búxìng de shì，huàizhàng yǎngàile suǒ juéqǔ de dàbùfèn jīn\'é。
不幸的是，坏账掩盖了所攫取的大部分金额。
They blotted out the stain on the shirt.
Tāmen yǎngài zhù chènshān shàng de wūdiǎn。
他们掩盖住衬衫上的污点。

我难掩自己因旅行而激动的心情。
Love covers a multitude of sins and overlooks weaknesses.
Ài huì yǎngài zhēnxiàng，ràng rén hūlüè quēdiǎn。
爱会掩盖真相，让人忽略缺点。
She has entered a world where beauty hides a multitude of sins.
Tā jìnrùle yí gè měimào yǎngài yíqiè de shìjiè。
她进入了一个美貌掩盖一切的世界。

他被指控试图掩盖证据。

有些美国人来服役，却身着皇家加拿大空军的制服来稍作掩饰。

这位明星戴着大黑超以掩饰自己。

He hung back in the shelter of a rock.

他们甚至不去掩饰想便宜收购他的公司的企图。

That story was swept under the carpet very quickly!
Nàge huǎngyán hěn kuài jiù bèi yǎnshìle guòqù。

Her father had a past which he\'d taken pains to cover up.
Tā fùqīn huā dàlìqì yǎngài tā de guòqù。
她父亲花大力气掩盖他的过去。
The actual emergence usually takes place under cover of darkness.
Shíjìshàng jǐnjí qíngkuàng tōngcháng dōu zài hēi\'àn de yǎnhù xià fāshēng。
实际上紧急情况通常都在黑暗的掩护下发生。
He couldn\'t suppress his contemptuous accent.
Tā wúfǎ yǎnshì àomàn de qiāngdiào。
他无法掩饰傲慢的腔调。

Tā yóuyú yǎnhù fànguī bèi jiàofá。
他由于掩护犯规被叫罚。
Her new name and passport are cover for her next assignment.
Tā de xīn míngzi hé hùzhào shì yònglái wèi tā xià yí xiàng shǐmìng dǎyǎnhù de。
她的新名字和护照是用来为她下一项使命打掩护的。

Tāmen yīnwèi hàipà gōngzhòng de fǎnyìng ér jiāng tā yǎngài qǐlái。
他们因为害怕公众的反应而将它掩盖起来。

Tā wúfǎ yǎnshì tā de díyì。
他无法掩饰他的敌意。

Tāmen yǎnmáile sǐzhě。
他们掩埋了死者。

他们死于没有掩蔽。

Smith covered again.
Shǐmìsī yòu dǎle yí cì yǎnhù。
史密斯又打了一次掩护。

Yǎnhùwù shǐ tāmen de qiāngzhī duǒ guò le díjī de zhēnchá。

Tā hěn hǎo de yǎnshì tā de fènnù。
她很好地掩饰她的愤怒。

Tā yǎngàile tā de shīwàngqíngxù。
他掩盖了他的失望情绪。

Méiyǒu miànjù kěyǐ yǎngài tā de wúzhī。
没有面具可以掩盖他的无知。

Tā zài xuǎnjǔ tuán zhōng de dàhuòquánshèng yǎngàile qí huòshèng piào lǜ zhǐyǒu 43% de shìshí。

Tā xūyào yìxiē qítè de shuōcí lái yǎngài suǒyǒu nàxiē huǎnghuà。

Tā yì liǎn de mángrán yǎnshìle tā de gǎnshòu。

她坚信问题最艰难的部分已解决。

我们需要再召开一些会议，深思一些艰难的决定。

chǔshēn zài yìchángjiānxiǎn de huánjìng zhōng
place oneself amid great hardships and dangers
艰苦朴素的作风是中国人民的传家宝。
Jiānkǔ pǔsù de zuòfēngshì Zhōngguó Rénmín de chuánjiābǎo。
Hard work and plain living is a cherished heritage of the Chinese people.
环境再艰苦也动摇不了他们征服自然的决心。
Huánjìng zài jiānkǔ yě dòngyáo bùliǎo tāmen zhēngfú zìrán de juéxīn。
No difficulties can shake their resolve to conquer nature.
伟大而艰巨的任务
wěidà ér jiānjù de rènwu
a great and arduous task
艰巨的工作
jiānjù de gōngzuò 
arduous work
这个工程非常艰巨。
Zhège gōngchéngfēichángjiānjù。
This is a formidable project.
艰苦的生活
jiānkǔ de shēnghuó 
hard life
艰苦的工作
jiānkǔ de gōngzuò 
a tough job
平生艰苦朴素
píngshēngjiānkǔ pǔsù 
live simply and work hard all one\'s life
行动艰难
xíngdòngjiānnán 
walk with difficulty
生活艰难
shēnghuó jiānnán 
live in straitened circumstances
艰难的岁月
jiānnán de suìyuè 
difficult days; hard times; arduous years
不论多么艰难困苦，我们都要继续战斗下去。
Búlùn duōme jiānnán kùnkǔ，wǒmen dōuyào jìxù zhàndòu xiàqù。
No matter what the difficulties and hardships, we will fight on.
经过无数艰难曲折
jīngguò wúshù jiānnán quzhé 
experience countless difficulties and setbacks
路上遇着了说不尽的艰难险阻。
Lùshàngyùzháo le shuō bu jìn de jiānnán xiǎnzǔ。
We encountered untold difficulties and dangers on the way.
文词艰涩
wéncí jiānsè 
involved and abstruse writing
不避艰险
bú bì jiānxiǎn 
brave hardships and dangers
他们历尽艰辛，方取得胜利。
Tāmen lìjìn jiānxīn，fāngqǔdé shènglì。
They achieved success only after experiencing all kinds of hardships.
禁得起艰苦环境的考验
jīn deqǐ jiānkǔ huánjìng de kǎoyàn
be able to stand the test of hardships
我从来没经验过这样的艰难。
Wǒ cónglái méi jīngyàn guò zhèyàng de jiānnán。
I have never experienced such hardships.
举步维艰
jǔbùwéijiān
have difficulty in taking a step
艰难困苦
jiānnán kùnkǔ
difficulties and hardships
历尽艰辛
lìjìn jiānxīn 
have gone through all kinds of hardships and difficulties
艰苦朴素是我们的传统美德。
Jiānkǔ pǔsù shì wǒmen de chuántǒngměidé。
Hard work and plain living are traditional virtues of ours.
哪里最艰苦就在哪里干
nǎlǐ zuì jiānkǔ jiù zài nǎlǐ gàn
go and work where the work is hardest
她平生是很艰苦朴素的。
Tā píngshēngshì hěn jiānkǔ pǔsù de。
She usually lives simply (or frugally) and works hard.
在艰苦环境中工作，经过千锤百炼，他意志越来越坚强了。
Zài jiānkǔ huánjìng zhōng gōngzuò，jīngguò qiānchuíbǎiliàn，tā yìzhì yuèláiyuè jiānqiáng le。
Toughened by working under difficult conditions, his will-power became stronger.
忍受艰难困苦
rěnshòu jiānnán kùnkǔ
endure hardships
以艰苦为荣
yǐ jiānkǔ wéi róng
take pride in working under difficult conditions
这段文字太艰深，不易上口。
Zhè duàn wénzì tài jiānshēn，bú yì shàngkǒu。
The passage is too difficult and doesn\'t lend itself to reading aloud.
艰难时世
jiānnán shíshì
hard times
青年人应该到艰苦的环境中去摔打摔打。
Qīngniánrén yīnggāi dào jiānkǔ de huánjìng zhōng qù shuāidǎ shuāidǎ。
Young people should temper themselves in difficult circumstances.
艰苦斗争的岁月
jiānkǔ dòuzhēng de suìyuè
years of arduous struggle
任务艰巨，同时时间又很紧迫。
Rènwu jiānjù，tóngshí shíjiān yòu hěn jǐnpò。
The task is arduous; besides, there\'s not much time.
他在崎岖的山路上艰难地行走着。
Tā zài qíqū de shānlù shàngjiānnán de xíngzǒu zhe。
He was trudging laboriously on the rugged mountain path.
大家一提起那艰苦创业的日子，总有说不完的话。
Dàjiā yì tíqǐ nà jiānkǔ chuàngyè de rìzi，zǒngyǒu shuō bu wán de huà。
Every time we talk about the hard pioneering days, we have so much to say that we can\'t get it all out.
遭际艰危
zāojì jiānwēi
be confronted with difficulties and dangers
艰险的征途
jiānxiǎn de zhēngtú 
a perilous journey
艰苦朴素
jiānkǔ pǔsù
hard work and plain living
艰涩
jiānsè
involved and abstruse; intricate and obscure
艰辛
jiānxīn
hardships
外面风很大，我们提着保险灯艰难地往前走。
Wàimiàn fēng hěndà，wǒmen tí zhe bǎoxiǎndēng jiānnán de wǎng qián zǒu。
The wind was strong. We struggled our way ahead with the help of a safety lamp.
生活艰苦的时候，人们只能靠秕谷充饥。
Shēnghuó jiānkǔ de shíhou，rénmen zhǐnéng kào bǐgǔ chōngjī。
When life was hard, people had to feed on blighted grains.
这次任务艰巨，让我们并力度过难关。
Zhècì rènwù jiānjù，ràng wǒmen bìnglì dùguò nánguān。
This is a very difficult task, and we have to work together closely.
她工作起来非常卖命，不惮艰辛。
Tā gōngzuò qǐlái fēicháng màimìng，búdàn jiānxīn。
She works very hard, and is never afraid of trouble.
家里又添了一个吃口，日子过得更加艰难了。
Jiā lǐ yòu tiān le yígè chīkǒu，rìzi guò de gèngjiā jiānnán le。
The family adds a mouth to feed, and life is even harder.
赤地千里，周围的老百姓生活非常艰难。
Chìdì qiānlǐ，zhōuwéi de lǎobǎixìng shēnghuó fēicháng jiānnán。
The people in the neighborhood lead a difficult life as they are surrounded by barren land that stretches for miles.
这些丛残的整理非常艰难，我们一定要有耐心。
Zhèxiē cóngcán de zhěnglǐ fēicháng jiānnán，wǒmen yídìng yào yǒu nàixīn。
Sorting out fragment pieces is difficult work that requires us patience.
他拖着断肢，艰难行走。
Tā tuō zhe duànzhī，jiānnán xíngzǒu。
With one of his legs cut off, he walks with difficulty.
他们孤孀相依为命，生活过得很艰难。
Tāmen gūshuāng xiāngyīwéimìng，shēnghuó guò de hěnjiānnán。
This widow and her child depend on each other for survival, life is really hard for them.
她寡居生活了十来年，日子过得很艰难。
Tā guǎjū shēnghuó le shí lái nián，rìzi guò de hěnjiānnán。
She has been living alone for more than ten years, life is very hard for her.
观察哨上的哨兵工作环境很艰苦。
Guāncháshào shàng de shàobīng gōngzuò huánjìng hěnjiānkǔ。
The working environment for guards at the observation post is very tough.
管区的下岗职工很多，我们的工作任务艰巨。
Guǎnqū de xiàgǎng zhígōng hěnduō，wǒmen de gōngzuò rènwù jiānjù。
Within this jurisdiction there are lots of laid-off workers, we have a tough job to do.
我们打算去革命红区旅游，感受革命先辈的艰苦精神。
Wǒmen dǎsuàn qù gémìng hóngqū lǚyóu，gǎnshòu gémìng xiānbèi de jiānkǔ jīngshén。
We decided to have a tour in the revolutionary base areas to feel the tough spirit of the revolutionary predecessors.
认定了这条路就要坚定地走下去，遇到什么艰难险阻也绝不回还。
Rèndìng le zhètiáo lù jiùyào jiāndìng de zǒu xiàqù，yùdào shénme jiānnán xiǎnzǔ yě juébùhuíhuán。
Once you have decided the way to go, you should move forward without hesitation. Whatever hardship you may be confronted with, you should never return to the starting point.
新的时期更需要艰苦奋斗的精神。
Xīn de shíqī gèng xūyào jiānkǔ fèndòu de jīngshén。
A spirit of hard work and plain living has become even more important in the new era.
我们在艰苦卓绝的情况下完成了任务。
Wǒmen zài jiānkǔ zhuójué de qíngkuàng xià wánchéng le rènwù。
We completed the job successfully in extremely hard conditions.
有了政府支持，农民工维权不再举步维艰。
Yǒu le zhèngfǔ zhīchí，nóngmíngōng wéiquán búzài jǔbùwéijiān。
With the support of the government, it is no longer so hard to defend the rights of migrant workers.
几年没见，他老苍的脸上显示这这几年生活的艰辛。
Jǐ nián méijiàn，tā lǎocāng de liǎnshàng xiǎnshì zhe zhè jǐnián shēnghuó de jiānxīn。
Meeting with him after several years and seeing his old and wizened appearance reveals the hardships he\'s had over the years.
魔术师的各种神奇技艺都是艰苦训练出来的。
Móshùshī de gèzhǒng shénqí jìyì dōushì jiānkǔ xùnliàn chūlái de。
All magic skills of magicians are learned through hard training.
我调集了全般员工来共同完成这项艰巨的任务。
Wǒ diàojí le quánbān yuángōng lái gòngtóng wánchéng zhè xiàng jiānjù de rènwù。
I assembled all the staff to complete the formidable task.
经过多年的艰苦谈判，中国终于成功入关。
Jīngguò duōnián de jiānkǔ tánpàn，Zhōngguó zhōng yú chénggōng rùguān。
After years of arduous negotiation, China was eventually admitted to the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade.
提起那些艰难的往事她就酸辛不已。
Tíqǐ nàxiē jiānnán de wǎngshì tā jiù suānxīn bùyǐ。
It makes her sad to mention those difficult past events.
他贪求享受，从来不懂艰苦朴素。
Tā tānqiú xiǎngshòu，cónglái bùdǒng jiānkǔ pǔsù。
He is forever seeking after material comforts, and has no idea about hard work and plain living.
小说中的主人公体尝过无数艰辛之后终于取得了成功。
Xiǎoshuō zhōng de zhǔréngōng tǐcháng guò wúshù jiānxīn zhīhòu zhōng yú qǔdé le chénggōng。
After much hardship, the hero of the novel finally achieved the success that he so well deserved.
你不应把这么艰巨的任务交给他，他的胆量比豚鼠还小。
Nǐ bùyīng bǎ zhème jiānjù de rènwù jiāogěi tā，tā de dǎnliàng bǐ túnshǔ hái xiǎo。
You shouldn\'t have given such an arduous task to him, as he is an absolute coward.
物质条件就算再艰苦也无法难倒我们。
Wùzhì tiáojiàn jiùsuàn zài jiānkǔ yě wúfǎ nándǎo wǒmen。
No matter how tough the material circumstances are, we are not afraid.
钱学森远渡重洋，历经艰辛才终于回到祖国。
Qián Xuésēn yuǎndù chóngyáng，lìjīng jiānxīn cái zhōng yú huídào zǔguó。
Qianxuesin travelled all the way across the ocean, finally returning to his motherland after undergoing various difficulties.
这场遭遇战打得十分艰苦，敌我双方伤亡惨重。
Zhèchǎng zāoyùzhàn dǎ de shífēn jiānkǔ，díwǒ shuāngfāng shāngwáng cǎnzhòng。
This contact battle is very hard. Both the enemy, and us have suffered heavy casualties.
战士们直面困难，不畏艰险。
Zhànshìmen zhímiàn kùnnan，búwèi jiānxiǎn。
The soldiers are face their difficulties directly without fear.
他那种钢铁般的意志是在长期的艰苦生活中铸成的。
Tā nàzhǒng gāngtiěbān de yìzhì shì zài chángqī de jiānkǔ shēnghuó zhōng zhùchéng de。
His iron-like will has been formed throughout his long and hard life.
要想成功，就得艰苦奋斗。
Yào xiǎng chénggōng，jiùděi jiānkǔfèndòu。
If you want to succeed, you must work hard.
艰苦的环境锻炼人的意志。
Jiānkǔde huánjìng duànliàn rénde yìzhì。
People are toughened by difficult experiences.
艰辛
jiānxīn
hardship
他们生活艰难。
Tāmen shēnghuó jiānnán.
Their life is hard.
这位病人觉得走路很艰难。
Zhè wèi bìngrén juéde zǒulù hěn jiānnán.
The invalid finds it difficult to walk.
路途极其艰险。
Lùtú jíqí jiānxiǎn.
The journey is hard and dangerous.
艰巨
jiānjù
onerous
你能受得了住在这样艰苦的环境里吗？
Nǐ néng shòudeliǎo zhùzài zhèyàng jiānkǔ de huánjìng lǐ ma？
Can you bear to live in this terrible environment?
学习非常艰难，但他坚持下来了。
Xuéxí fēicháng jiānnán，dàn tā jiānchíxiàláile。
Studying was arduous, but he persisted.

青年人要到艰苦环境中去摔打才能成才。

经过艰苦奋斗，终于取得了预期的效果。
