着重强调要艰苦奋斗。
The hardest task was before them.
最艰巨的任务摆在他们面前。

The car labored up the hill
汽车艰难地爬上山去。
She stuck through thick and thin.
她忍受了各种艰难困苦。
She won the spelling bee through hard work and determination.
因为艰苦的努力和坚定的决心，她赢得了拼字比赛的胜利。
It is rough to be a soldier in Iraq.
在伊拉克当兵是很艰苦的。
She was seasoned to the hard life.
她过惯了艰苦的生活。
The political situation is difficult enough so it is better to avoid more conflicts.
现在政局已经够艰难的了，因此最好避免更多冲突。
She has been my companion through all my trials and tribulations.
她陪我经历了种种艰难困苦。
After great difficulty, she finally found a job.
她历尽艰难终于找到了一份工作。
They finally reached an agreement at the close of a hard week of negotiations.
最终，他们达成了协议，结束了一周来艰难的磋商。
Every day at work I have to take very difficult decisions.
每天工作的时候我都要做出艰难的选择。
Finding an apartment in any city can be a difficult task.
在任何城市找房子都是个艰巨的任务。

[inf] 艰难的处境
to have a rough time
处境艰难
He saw me through the hard times.
他曾帮我度过艰难岁月。
to have a struggle to do sth
艰难地做某事
The strenuous exercise made great demands on her system.
艰苦的锻炼使她的身体付出很大的代价。
an uphill struggle {or} battle (to do sth)
(做某事的)艰苦奋斗
to have your work cut out
面临艰巨的任务
Her weather-beaten face tells of a hard life.
她饱经风霜的脸说明艰苦的生活。
Constant hardship and suffering have turned him into a tough man.
持续的艰苦磨难使他变成了坚强的人。
No matter how difficult it becomes, I will never desert you.
无论有多么艰难，我都不会抛弃你。
The hard experiences in the early years reinforced his ambition of going ahead in business career.
他在早年的艰难经历坚定了他要在职业上出人头地的抱负。
The clergyman\'s health is so inadequate to sustain the hardships of a forest life.
这位牧师的健康状况极不适合忍受森林中的艰苦生活。
All the hardship she experienced tempered her will.
经历的所有艰辛磨练了她的意志。
The transition from a communist system to a free market economy will be difficult.
从共产主义经济向市场经济转变将会非常艰难。
As hard as I tried, it proved difficult to get into his camp.
Wǒ jiānnán de chángshì zhèngmíngle yào jìnrù tā de zhènyíng hěnnán。
我艰难的尝试证明了要进入他的阵营很难。
Job maintained his faith in God through hardships.
Yuēbó lìjīngjiānxīn réng jiānchí duì shàngdì de xìnyǎng。
约伯历经艰辛仍坚持对上帝的信仰。
We experienced great difficulty in taming tigers.
Wǒmen zài xùnfú lǎohǔ de guòchéng zhōng lìjìn jiānxīn。
我们在驯服老虎的过程中历尽艰辛。
Without proper technical knowledge, future development will be much more difficult.
Rúguǒ bú jùbèi shìdàng de zhuānyèzhīshí，wèilái de fāzhǎn jiāng gèngjiā jǔbùwéijiān。
如果不具备适当的专业知识，未来的发展将更加举步维艰。
Digging through the till proved to be a difficult task.
Jīng zhèngshí，wātòu bīng lì ní shì yí xiàng jiānjù de rènwù。
经证实，挖透冰砾泥是一项艰巨的任务。
The traverse across the country will be long and arduous.
Chuānyuè zhège guójiā jiāng shì màncháng ér yòu jiānkǔ de lǚchéng。
穿越这个国家将是漫长而又艰苦的旅程。

Zài lǚguǎn jiǔbājiān dàile yì zhěngyè，wǒmen dōu hē de zuìxūnxūn de。
在旅馆酒吧间待了一整夜，我们都喝得醉醺醺的。
They stayed in the pub until closing time and they all got well oiled.
他们在酒吧里一直呆到打烊时间，结果他们都喝醉了。
那个醉汉踉踉跄跄地在路上走着。
Nàge zuìhàn liàngliangqiàngqiàng de zài lù shàngzǒu zhe。
The drunk man staggered along the road.
那醉汉歪歪倒倒地走着。
Nà zuìhàn wāiwāidǎodǎo de zǒu zhe。
The drunk man reeled along.
司机赶紧拨转方向盘，才没有撞上那个骑自行车的醉汉。
Sījī gǎnjǐn bōzhuǎn fāngxiàng pán，cái méiyǒu zhuàngshàng nàge qí zìxíngchē de zuìhàn。
一个醉汉在街上撒野。
Yígè zuìhàn zài jiēshàng sāyě。
A man was throwing a drunken fit in the middle of the street.
这些醉汉大打出手，上演了一出全武行。
He was roused by the drunken men in the street.
Tā zài Jiēshàng bèi zuìhànmen gǎoxǐng le。
他在街上被醉汉们搞醒了。
He was charged with rolling drunks in the park.
Tā bèi zhǐkòng zài gōngyuán duì zuìhàn shíshī qiǎngjié。
他被指控在公园对醉汉实施抢劫。
他用麻醉枪把麻醉药剂射入了发疯的大象的体内。
Tā yòng mázuìqiāng bǎ mázuì yàojì shèrù le fāfēng de dà xiàng de tǐnèi。
He used an anesthetic rifle to inject the drug into the body of the mad elephant.

shǐ zhēn cì mázuì búduàn wánshàn 
bring about steady improvement in acupuncture anaesthesia

chénzuì zài jiérì de huānlè lǐ

dīwēn mázuì

他每天都喝得醉醺醺的，是个十足的酒徒。

He always bought liquor and drank greatly after failure in love.

He might have been high on drugs.

He used an anesthetic rifle to inject the drug into the body of the mad elephant.

anaesthetic; narcotic

These books are as detrimental as drugs to adolescents.

The doctor says that he will not wake until the anesthetic loses potency.
警察在他的书包里检查出大量的麻醉品。

The police found plenty of drugs in his schoolbag.

a general anaesthetic (英) {或} anesthetic (美)

jiǔ zuì shīyán

jiǔ zuì wèi xǐnɡ
be drunk and not sobered up yet

This wine makes people drunk easily. They feel as if treading on air after drinking just a little of it.

警务人员要用警绳约束举止失控的醉酒人。

The police officers use police ropes to discipline drunkards.
失恋后，他总是去小酒馆买醉。

He always bought liquor and drank greatly after failure in love.
他的那般朋友每次聚会都会喝醉酒。
Tā de nàbān péngyou měi cì jùhuì dōuhuì hēzuìjiǔ。
His friends got drunk at every party.
他没有酒量，喝点儿色酒就会醉倒。
Tā méiyǒu jiǔliàng，hē diǎnr sèjiǔ jiùhuì zuìdǎo。
He has no capacity for liquor, and gets drunk after little wine.
他不胜酒力，终于醉倒了。
Tā búshèngjiǔlì，zhōngyú zuìdǎo le。
He had no tolerance for alcohol, and in the end fell down dead drunk.
他不胜酒力，喝一点儿就醉。
Tā búshèngjiǔlì，hē yì diǎnr jiù zuì。
He can\'t hold much liquor, and will get drunk after drinking a bit.

他每天都喝得醉醺醺的，是个十足的酒徒。

He gets drunk every day and is a real wino.

这种酒容易醉人。

那个醉酒之人跌跌撞撞。
His answer to any problem was to get drunk.
Yí yùdào wèntí tā jiù yòng zuìjiǔ lái táobì。
一遇到问题他就用醉酒来逃避。

喝醉了
hē zuì le
be drunk
他喝醉了。
Tā hēzuì le。
He\'s tipsy. or He\'s had a drop too much.
他喝醉了，一直说着痴话。
Tā hēzuì le，yìzhí shuō zhe chīhuà。

Maybe he got dead drunk since he is in a coma.

喝醉了
to get sb drunk/into trouble
使某人喝醉/陷入麻烦
to get drunk
喝醉了
he was drunk half the time
[inf] 他大部分时候都是喝醉的
The man is not a competent witness because he was drunk at the time.
这个人当时喝醉了，因此无权作证。
The girl\'s face is red and vague. I guess she is drunk.
这个女孩的脸很红，表情很茫然，我觉得她喝醉了。
You got so drunk you spoiled the party last night.
你喝醉了，破坏了昨晚的聚会。
They stayed in the pub until closing time and they all got well oiled.
他们在酒吧里一直呆到打烊时间，结果他们都喝醉了。
Although he was drunk, he spoke in a coherent manner.
Suīrán tā hēzuìle，dàn tā shuōhuà háishì hěn hé yǒu luójì。
虽然他喝醉了，但他说话还是很合有逻辑。
Sometimes he gets drunk and rough with his wide.

有时候他一喝醉便粗暴对待他的妻子。
He can be volatile when he is drunk.
Tā zài hēzuì shí qíngxù kěnéng biànhuà wúcháng。
他在喝醉时情绪可能变化无常。
He was in drink and didn\'t know what he was doing.
Tā hēzuìle，bùzhīdào zìjǐ zài gàn shénme。
他喝醉了，不知道自己在干什么。
Too much drinking on vodka can make one drunk.
Yǐn guòliàng Fútèjiā néng shǐ rén hēzuì。
饮过量伏特加能使人喝醉。
They got drunk and danced like mad in the garden.
Tāmen dōu hēzuìle,fēngkuáng de zài huāyuán lǐ tiàowǔ。
他们都喝醉了，疯狂地在花园里跳舞。
He will loosen up his wallet when he\'s drunk.
Tā hēzuì hòu huāqián huì hěn dàfang。
他喝醉后花钱会很大方。

Chènshān tuìsè le。
衬衫褪色了。
A crowd of dirty-faced ragamuffins surrounded him.
Yì qún péngtóugòumiàn、yīshānlánlǚ de rén wéi zài tā zhōuwéi。
一群蓬头垢面、衣衫褴褛的人围在他周围。
The men languidly put on their jackets.
Nàxiē rén píjuàn wúlì de chuānshàngle jiákèshān。
那些人疲倦无力地穿上了夹克衫。
Please take in this skirt--I\'ve lost weight.
Qǐng shōujǐn yíxià zhè tiáo chènshān，wǒ biànshòu le。
请收紧一下这条衬衫，我变瘦了。
He fagotted the blouse for his wife.
Tā gěi tā qīzǐ féngle yí jiàn chènshān。
他给他妻子缝了一件衬衫。
He was soiled and seedy and fragrant with gin.
Tā yīshānlánlǚ、 lātā bùkān，dàn què yīn dù sōngzǐjiǔ ér dàiyǒu xiāngqì。
他衣衫褴褛、邋遢不堪，但却因杜松子酒而带有香气。
Unbelted jackets are in this season.
Wú dài jiákèshān zài zhège jìjié hěn liúxíng。
无带夹克衫在这个季节很流行。
Take off your shirt--it\'s very hot in here.
Tuōdiào chènshān bā，zhèli hěn rè。
脱掉衬衫吧，这里很热。
他白汗衫的脖领儿处有些脏了。
Tā báihànshān de bólǐngrchù yǒuxiē zāng le。
The collar of his white shirt was dirty.
白衬衫被汗水渍黄了。
Báichènshān bèi hànshuǐ zìhuáng le。
The white shirt has yellowed with sweat.
汗水湿透了他的衣衫。
Hànshuǐ shītòu le tā de yīshān。
His shirt was soaked through with sweat.
你的球衫该洗了，上面全是汗渍。
Nǐ de qiúshān gāi xǐ le，shàngmiàn quánshì hànzì。
Your polo shirt needs to be washed, it is stained with sweat.
汗衫
This undershirt is made of thin fabric.
这件汗衫是薄布料制成的。
It was a muggy day and his shirt clung to his sweat.
Tiānqì mēnrè，tā de chènshān hé hànshuǐ jǐnjǐn niánzài yìqǐ。
天气闷热，他的衬衫和汗水紧紧黏在一起。
可口可乐公司的员工每个人都有一件广告衫。
Kěkǒukělè gōngsī de yuángōng měigèrén dōu yǒu yíjiàn guǎnggàoshān。
All the staff of the Coca-Cola Company have their own advertising T-shirt.
开衫配长裙，她这身打扮可真漂亮。
Kāishān pèi chángqún，tā zhè shēn dǎbàn kě zhēn piàoliàng。
She dressed in a sweater together with a long skirt, and looked very pretty.
这件衬衫的后身太长了。
Zhèjiàn chènshān de hòushēn tài cháng le。
The back of the shirt is too long.
长衫
The hats are ideal worn with this season\'s long, buttoned skirts.
Zhèzhǒng màozi yǔ zhège jìjié liúxíng de dài kòu chángshān hěn dāpèi。
这种帽子与这个季节流行的带扣长衫很搭配。
引渡过江。
把劫机分子引渡回国。
to be extradited to Britain
被引渡到英国
They extradited the fugitive to his native country so he could be tried there.
Tāmen bǎ zhè míng táowángzhě yǐndù huí běnguó，yǐbiàn tā zài nàli shòushěn。
他们把这名逃亡者引渡回本国，以便他在那里受审。
为了坚决打击偷渡犯罪，警方建立了严密的海上封锁线。
Wèile jiānjué dǎjī tōudù fànzuì，jǐngfāng jiànlì le yánmì de hǎishàng fēngsuǒ xiàn。
In order to strike a blow at the smugglers, the police established a naval blockade.
昨天夜里巡逻队又截获了一艘企图偷渡的蛇船。
Zuótiān yèlǐ xúnluóduì yòu jiéhuò le yí sōu qǐtú tōudù de shéchuán。
Last night, the patrol team captured another boat that intended to ferry across the border secretly.
我们绝对不能让偷渡活动抬头。
Wǒmen juéduì bùnéng ràng tōudùhuódòng táitóu。
We must not let the people-smugglers get a foothold.
偷渡客
tōudùkè
illegal immigrant
缉拿偷渡的贩毒分子。
He got to America by means of illegal transportation.
Tā fēifǎ tōudù dàole Měiguó。
他非法偷渡到了美国。
轮渡
因雾气过大，轮渡今日暂停。
赶快把这批货轮渡过江。

英格兰西南部和威尔士之间首次轮渡的初步设计方案已经起草。

所有的火车轮渡交通都将经多佛中转。
龙舟竞渡
lónɡzhōu jìnɡdù
dragon boat regatta
每到端午节，这里都会举行飞舟竞渡的划龙船比赛。
Měi dào Duānwǔ Jié，zhèlǐ dū huì jǔxíng fēizhōu jìngdù de huálóngchuán bǐsài。
Boating competitions are held here during every Dragon Boat Festival.
龙舟竞渡。
万名健儿竞渡长江。
横渡太平洋的飞行
héngdù Tàipíngyáng de fēixíng
a trans-Pacific flight
横渡英吉利海峡
héngdù Yīngjílì hǎixiá
cross the English Channel
横渡太平洋
横渡长江
万里长江横渡
横渡英吉利海峡。
五千弄潮儿横渡长江。
Two Cubans who tried to sail to Florida in a converted boat last year are making another attempt, this time piloting an old floating car.
那两个古巴人，去年想要开艘改装的小船横渡到佛罗里达去，这次又尝试起改装破旧的浮动车来实行横渡计划了。
He wants to swim the channel because it\'s always been his dream.
Tā xiǎngyào yóuyǒng héngdù hǎixiá，yīnwèi zhè yìzhí shì tā de mèngxiǎng。
他想要游泳横渡海峡，因为这一直是他的梦想。
In 1919 the first two-way crossing of the Atlantic was completed by plane.
Yījiǔyījiǔ nián，dì-yī cì shuāngxiàng héngdù Dàxīyáng yóu fēijī shíxiàn le。

He swam across the English Channel.
Tā héngdùle Yīngjílì Hǎixiá。
他横渡了英吉利海峡。
有了鸳鸯房作为过渡性用房，他俩马上办了婚事。
Yǒu le yuānyāngfángzuòwéi guòdùxìngyòngfáng，tā liǎ mǎshàngbàn le hūnshì。
They got married as soon as they obtained a mandarin duck apartment as their temporary home.
Our family pulled through with the help of our neighbors.
Zài línjū de bāngzhù xià，wǒmenjiā dùguòle kùnnan shíqī。
在邻居的帮助下，我们家渡过了困难时期。
过渡阶段
guòdù jiēduàn 
transitional stage
有了鸳鸯房作为过渡性用房，他俩马上办了婚事。
Yǒu le yuānyāngfángzuòwéi guòdùxìngyòngfáng，tā liǎ mǎshàngbàn le hūnshì。
They got married as soon as they obtained a mandarin duck apartment as their temporary home.
上句和下句之间需要用关联词语过渡一下。
Shàngjù hé xiàjù zhījiān xūyào yòng guānlián cíyǔ guòdù yíxià。
The former part of the sentence should be connected to the later part through a conjunction.
行舟过渡时不要乱动，小心落水。
Xíngzhōu guòdù shí búyào luàndòng，xiǎoxīn luòshuǐ。
Do not wave on a boat, or you will fall into the water.
我们马上要过渡到下一个阶段的工作，大家要尽快适应。
Wǒmen mǎshàng yào guòdù dào xià yígè jiēduàn de gōngzuò，dàjiā yào jìnkuài shìyìng。
We will move on to next phase soon, you all should get accustomed to it quickly.
汉隶是篆字和楷书的过渡。
Hànlì shì zhuànzì hé kǎishū de guòdù。
Han script is a transitional form from seal to regular script.
隶体是书法从篆体到楷体的过渡。
Lìtǐ shì shūfǎ cóng zhuàntǐ dào kǎitǐ de guòdù。
The official script in calligraphy is a transition between seal character, and regular script.
渡过难关
dùguò nánguān
tide over a difficulty; pull through
旱区人民需要我们的帮助来渡过难关。
Hànqū rénmín xūyào wǒmen de bāngzhù lái dùguò nánguān。
People in the drought region need our help to weather the crunch.
烦请这位梢公带我渡过河去吧？
Fán qǐng zhèwèi shāogōng dài wǒ dùguo hé qù ba？
Excuse me, helmsman, would you please ferry me across this river?
看来只有把这些添箱卖了才能渡过难关了。
Kànlái zhǐyǒu bǎ zhèxiē tiānxiāng mài le cáinéng dùguò nánguān le。
I guess we have to sell these presents from the wedding to get through this difficultly.
他帮助我们渡过难关。
Tā bāngzhù wǒmen dùguònánguān。
He helped us through a difficult time.
我们咬紧牙关渡过了难关。
Wǒmen yǎojǐnyáguān dùguòle nánguān。
We gritted our teeth through the tough times.
你听过红军飞渡泸定桥的故事吗？
Nǐ tīng guò hóngjūn fēidù lúdìngqiáo de gùshì ma?
Have you ever heard of the story about how the Red Army passed across Lugou bridge at full speed?
从汉口过渡到武昌。
由新民主主义过渡到社会主义。
澳门过渡期语言发展路向学术讨论会。
伴我渡过难关
因雾气过大，轮渡今日暂停。
靠大家帮凑，总算渡过了难关。
我不会游泳，还是摆渡过去吧。
帮助他渡过难关
赶快把这批货轮渡过江。
渡过了乌江天险。
引渡过江。
transition from/to sth
从/向某事物过渡
A transition is too rapid to be expressed by a sequence of symbols.
Guòdù tài kuài，yíxìliè fúhào bìng bùnéng biǎoshì。
过渡太快，一系列符号并不能表示。
It will be phased in over a four-year transition period.
Zài sì nián de guòdùqī nèi，tā jiāng bèi zhúbù cǎiyòng。
在四年的过渡期内，它将被逐步采用。
Unemployment dominated the politics of the inter-war years.
Shīyè shì nàgè zhànzhēng guòdù niándài miànlín de zhǔyào zhèngzhì wèntí。
失业是那个战争过渡年代面临的主要政治问题。
Catalysts are said to reduce the energy of activation during the transition phase of a reaction.
Cuīhuàjì jùshuō néng jiǎnshǎo héfǎnyìng de guòdù jiēduàn de jīhuó néngliàng。
催化剂据说能减少核反应的过渡阶段的激活能量。
Adolescence is an awkward in-between age.
Qīngchūnqī shì yí duàn nányǐ chǔlǐ de guòdù niánlíng。
青春期是一段难以处理的过渡年龄。
But there is still a twilight zone, the tantalizing occurrences that are probably noise but might possibly be a signal.
Dàn yīrán cúnzài yígè guòdù qūyù，huì chūxiàn yěxǔ shì zàoshēng dàn yě kěnéng shì xìnhào de lìng rén zhuōmōbúdìng de qíngkuàng。
但依然存在一个过渡区域，会出现也许是噪声但也可能是信号的令人捉摸不定的情况。
Adolescence is a transitional stage between childhood and adulthood.
Qīngchūnqī shì értóngqī hé chéngniánqī zhījiān de yí gè guòdù jiēduàn。
青春期是儿童期和成年期之间的一个过渡阶段。
The transition towards more balanced global growth is the third major challenge.
dìsān dà tiǎozhàn shì xiàng gèngwéi jūnhéng de Quánqiú zēngzhǎng guòdù。
第三大挑战是向更为均衡的全球增长过渡。
doubtful whether he can last (out) the year
他是否能安然渡过这一年值得怀疑
to weather a storm
克服困难；渡过难关
We spent the night on the beach drinking wine and talking.
我们一边喝酒一边聊天，在海滨渡过了一晚。
We spent a lazy summer at the shore.
我们在海边渡过了一个慵懒的夏天。
The lake crossing was quite an adventure.
渡过这个湖真是十足的冒险行为。
Their hope helped those people to carry through this last ordeal.
他们的希望帮助了那些人渡过了最后的严酷考验。
to turn the corner
[fig] 渡过难关
to ferry sth/sb across {or} over
载某物/某人渡过
$50 should see you through.
50美金应该能够帮你渡过难关。
Cut prices mean that travellers will be able to get a cheaper summer holiday this year.

We stepped from stone to stone across the stream, below the trees.

我们从树下的一块石头跨到另一块，从大树下渡过了小溪。
We can keep bringing them through.

我们可以一直帮助他们渡过困难。

He had gone over the edge.
Tā yǐjīng dùguòle biānjìng。
他已经渡过了边境。

The memories in your heart will see you through.
Xīnzhōng de jìyì huì bāng nǐ dùguò nánguān。
心中的记忆会帮你渡过难关。
The rest of the day was spent in Park.

剩下的时间在公园里渡过。
They played together closely tiding over their difficulties and won the game finally.
Tāmen mìqiè hézuò dùguònánguān，zuìzhōng yíngdé bǐsài。
他们密切合作渡过难关，最终赢得比赛。
Your quick actions have helped us to weather the storm.
Nǐ xùnjié de xíngdòng yǐ bāng wǒmen dùguòle nánguān。
你迅捷的行动已帮我们渡过了难关。
They have no food to maintain to see them through the winter.
Tāmen méiyǒu shíwù zúyǐ wéichí zìjǐ dùguò dōngjì。
他们没有食物足以维持自己渡过冬季。
They spent a lazy summer at the shore.
Tāmen zài hǎibiān dùguòle yí gè yōnglǎn de xiàtiān。
他们在海边渡过了一个慵懒的夏天。

dùhé

摔伤
shuāishānɡ
fall and hurt oneself
他从梯子上掉了下来，摔伤了颌骨。
Tā cóng tīzi shàng diào le xiàlái，shuāishāng le hégǔ。
He fell from a ladder, and broke his jaw bone.
他从马上摔了下来，只受了点外伤。
Tā cóng mǎshàng shuāilexiàlái，zhǐ shòulediǎn wàishāng。
He fell off his horse, but only had a slight injury.
坠马摔伤。
Del Piero injured his leg when he had a nasty trip on the stairs of his villa.
德尔·皮耶罗在自己别墅的楼梯上绊了一下，摔伤了腿。
I slipped from the stairs and broke my ankle.
Wǒ cóng lóutī shàng huá xiàlái，shuāishāngle jiǎohuái。
我从楼梯上滑下来，摔伤了脚踝。
She had a fall in the street and hurt her head.
她在街上摔倒，跌伤了头。
The wrestler twisted his shoulder.
Zhè míng shuāijiāo duìyuán niǔshāngle jiānbǎng。
这名摔跤队员扭伤了肩膀。
She hurt her legs in a spill.
她摔倒时把腿弄伤了。
The driver manages to save the girl from falling, but only at the cost of injuring himself.
司机费了好大劲不让那个女孩摔倒，但是自己却受了伤。
The break seems to have been caused by a fall.
Shāngkǒu kàn qǐlái xiàngshì yīn shuāidǎo zàochéng de。
伤口看起来像是因摔倒造成的。
花瓶是我妹妹摔破的。
Huāpíng shì wǒ mèimei shuāipò de。
It was my sister who broke the vase.
他不小心跌了一跤，摔破了自己的眉棱。
Tā bùxiǎoxīn diē le yì jiāo，shuāipò le zìjǐ de méiléng。
He carelessly tumbled, and broke his superciliary ridge.
我不小心跌了一跤，把上唇摔破了。
Wǒ bùxiǎoxīn diē le yì jiāo，bǎ shàngchún shuāipò le。
I carelessly tumbled and broke my upper lip.
他失业后破罐破摔。
Tā shīyè hòu pòguànpòshuāi.
After he lost his job, he learned nothing from his mistakes.
摔了一跤，脸上磕破了皮
Shuāi le yì jiāo，liǎn shàngkēpò le pí。
fall and graze one\'s face
一个跟头，几乎摔破了头
只摔破点皮，不要紧。
I broke open the tin box that you keep your money in.
Wǒ shuāipòle nǐ cúnqián de xītiěhé。
我摔破了你存钱的锡铁盒。
他摔了一交，右臂骨折了。
Tā shuāi le yì jiāo，yòu bì gǔzhé le。
He fell and fractured his right arm.

体重不受规则限制的摔交赛

电风扇被摔坏，不转了。

她的手表摔坏了。

shuāi gēntou

伤口看起来像是因摔倒造成的。
The horses foundered.
Zhèxiē mǎ shuāidǎo le。
这些马摔倒了。

Bǎ sàozhou shàng de ní shuāidǎ shuāidǎ。

After a few years of toughening himself up, he had become much stronger.
他打了个趔趄，摔倒了。
Tā dǎ le gè lièqie，shuāidǎo le。

他打球的时候摔了一跤，腓骨骨折了。

那晚他们精心打扮，进行摔跤。
The wrestler\'s charge carried him past his adversary.

shèxià máifú
lay an ambush

中埋伏
zhòngmáifú
fall into an ambush

没想到路上居然设有埋伏，他险遭不测。

We used strategy to seduce the enemy into attacking the small town that we had ambushed.

mái dìléi

其他人认为他就是他们中最有天分的乐器演奏家，因为他能够演奏所有的簧乐器、钢琴和喇叭。
Symphonies,concertos,sonatas,etc. are called classical music.
交响乐、协奏曲、奏鸣曲等被称为古典(派)音乐。 [区别于 popular，romantic，modern]
The music they perform is diverse and exciting, displaying their instruments\' unusual and impressive abilities.
Tāmen yǎnzòu de yīnyuè fēnggéduōyàng éryòu lìng rén xīngfèn，zhǎnshìle tāmen zài yuèqì shàng de fēifán ér lìng rén yìnxiàngshēnkè de cáinéng。

奏效
zòuxiào
prove effective; be successful; get the desired result
奏效
Zòuxiào
have effect
这感冒药吃下去立即奏效。

奏效。
单用一种方法，有时难以奏效。

难于奏效。
这个办法果然奏效。

efforts that are beginning to tell
正开始奏效的努力
but it does work!
但那确实奏效！

十分清楚的是，这方法不奏效。
that should do the trick
[inf] 这应该奏效

判断这个方法是否奏效并不容易。

zòuyuè

奏效
zòuxiào
prove effective; be successful; get the desired result
它堪称我国最古老的“协奏曲”了，八音和谐。

It is the oldest concerto in China, with the harmonious tune.
编磬是古代一种石制击打乐器，演奏方式很特别。

这位著名的音乐家正在创作一部大型变奏曲。

他的哥哥是一名出色的大管演奏家。

His brother is an outstanding bassoon player.

这首小提琴独奏曲非常动听。

这首乐曲是用凤凰琴弹奏出来的。

This piece of music is played with an ancient musical instrument.

他们表演了一首无伴奏的合唱。
They act with vigour, sing with great effect, and the small, but rather loud orchestra, sweep them all along.
Tāmen de biǎoyǎn fēicháng yǒu huólì，gēchàng xiàoguǒ hěn bàng，ér nà zhī rénshù bù duō què zòuyuè gāokàng de guǎnxián yuèduì zhēngfúle suǒyǒu zàichǎng guānzhòng。
他们的表演非常有活力，歌唱效果很棒，而那支人数不多却奏乐高亢的管弦乐队征服了所有在场观众。
钢琴(小提琴)协奏曲
gāngqín（xiǎotíqín）xiézòuqǔ
piano (violin) concerto
A小调协奏曲
A xiǎodiào xiézòuqǔ
concerto in A minor
它堪称我国最古老的“协奏曲”了，八音和谐。
Tā kānchēng wǒguó zuì gǔlǎo de“xiézòuqǔ”le，bāyīn héxié。
It is the oldest concerto in China, with the harmonious tune.
舞台上正在演奏小提琴协奏曲。
Wǔtái shàng zhèngzài yǎnzòu xiǎotíqín xiézòuqǔ。
A violin concerto is being played on the stage.
小提琴协奏曲《梁山伯与祝英台》。
钢琴协奏曲《黄河》。
Symphonies,concertos,sonatas,etc. are called classical music.
交响乐、协奏曲、奏鸣曲等被称为古典(派)音乐。 [区别于 popular，romantic，modern]
(symphony/concerto) in C major
C大调(交响乐/协奏曲)
The six finalists then played two piano concertos each.
Ránhòu，liù míng juésài xuǎnshǒu měi rén yǎnzòule liǎng shǒu gāngqín xiézòuqǔ。
然后，六名决赛选手每人演奏了两首钢琴协奏曲。

They performed a cappella.

这首乐曲是用凤凰琴弹奏出来的。

This piece of music is played with an ancient musical instrument.
a delicate touch
灵巧的弹奏；神妙的弹奏
The pianist pounded out the tune with great effort.
钢琴师用了很大气力才弹奏出这个调子。

当我听到她那丰满轻柔的嗓音，以及吉他弹奏时，我当场就爱上了她。
He plays a double bass.
他在弹奏低音提琴。
He would bow the violin rapidly.
Tā nénggòu kuàisù tánzòu xiǎotíqín。
他能够快速弹奏小提琴。
You could hear the gentle strumming of two guitars from the house.
Nǐ néng tīngdào cóng nà fángzi lǐ chuán chūlái de liǎng bǎ jítā yuè\'ěr de tánzòu shēng。
你能听到从那房子里传出来的两把吉他悦耳的弹奏声。
There\'s just this \'noise\' from which you have to strain to pick out the melody.

从这个“噪音”中你要试图弹奏出一首曲子。
They can even hear samples of what each instrument sounds like .
Tāmen kěyǐ shìtīng měige yuèqì tánzòu de yīndiào。
他们可以试听每个乐器弹奏的音调。
Frank tuned up his guitar and began to play.
Fúlánkè tiáoshìle jítā，kāishǐ tánzòu。
弗兰克调试了吉他，开始弹奏。
The rock star totals his guitar at every concert.
Zhè míng yáogǔn gēxīng zài měi chǎng yīnyuèhuì shàng zǒngshì yǐ tánzòu jítā zuòwéi yāzhòuxì。
这名摇滚歌星在每场音乐会上总是以弹奏吉他作为压轴戏。
Trouble is, I can\'t ever remember how to play the guitar solo!
Wèntí shì wǒ shènzhì bújìde zěnme tán jítā dúzòuqǔ。
问题是我甚至不记得怎么弹吉他独奏曲。
四重奏
sìchóngzòu 
(instrumental) quartet
弦乐四重奏
xiányuè sìchóngzòu
string quartet
to play with a string quartet
参加弦乐四重奏
For the string quartet, the process of composition was spread out over many months.
Duì zhège xiányuè sì chóngzòu yuètuán láishuō，pǔqǔ de guòchéng yánxùle hěn duō gè yuè。
对这个弦乐四重奏乐团来说，谱曲的过程延续了很多个月。
这个乐曲将以三重奏的形式进行演奏。
Zhège yuèqǔ jiāng yǐ sānchóngzòu de xíngshì jìnxíng yǎnzòu。
The music was performed in the form of a trio.
他最新创作了一首三重奏乐曲。
Tā zuìxīn chuàngzuòle yìshǒu sānchóngzòu yuèqǔ。
He recently has produced a piece of trio music.
弦乐三重奏。
这次事件是大罢工的前奏曲。也说前奏。
德国入侵波兰是第二次世界大战的前奏。
Déguó rùqīn Bōlán shì Dì Èr Cì Shìjiè Dàzhàn de qiánzòu。
The German invasion of Poland was a prelude to World War II.
拉纤的船夫在河岸上一步步挣扎着前进，一面有节奏地齐声哼着“杭育！杭育！”
Lāqiàn de chuánfū zài hé\'àn shàngyíbù bùzhēngzhá zhe qiánjìn，yí miàn yǒu jiézòu de qíshēngheng zhe “hángyù！hángyù！”
As they inched forward, step by step, on the banks of the river, the boat-pullers kept up a constant rhythmical &quot;Heave ho! Heave ho!&quot;
这次事件是大罢工的前奏曲。也说前奏。
The brief introduction of the song involves at most four to five different notes.

Jiǔshuǐ shì wǎncān de qiánzòu。
酒水是晚餐的前奏。

xīnlà de fěngcì
bitter irony; biting sarcasm
这个酸辣汤真有味儿。
Zhège suānlàtāngzhēn yǒuwèir。
This vinegar-pepper soup is so delicious.
火辣的太阳炙烤着大地。
Huǒlà de tàiyángzhìkǎo zhe dàdì。
The blazing sun scorches the earth.
辣椒
làjiāo
hot pepper; chilli
如果是因为上火而经常鼻衄，那就应当忌食辛辣了。
Rúguǒ shì yīnwèi shànghuǒ ér jīngcháng bínǜ，nà jiù yīngdāng jìshí xīnlà le。
If you suffer from epistaxis caused by excessive internal heat, then you should not eat any spicy food.
常年胃病，我吃不得辣椒等刺激性食物。
Chángnián wèibìng，wǒ chībùde làjiāo děng cìjīxìng shíwù。
I can\'t eat spicy food because I have had a stomach bug for years.
川菜以其麻辣鲜香的味道得到了众多人的喜爱。
Chuāncài yǐ qí málàxiānxiāng de wèidào dédào le zhòngduōrén de xǐ\'ài。
Sichuan style food, with its spicy and delicious taste, has won many people\'s love.
这些豆瓣儿做成的酱都是辣的。
Zhèxiē dòubànr zuòchéng de jiàng dōushì là de。
The thick broad-bean sauce is spicy.
大夫说，吃药期间戒辛辣油腻，你可别让他犯戒啊！
Dàifu shuō，chīyào qījiān jiè xīnlà yóunì，nǐ kě bié ràng tā fànjiè a！
The doctor said that he could not have spicy or rich food during his treatment period, please ensure that he doesn\'t.
这个女人太火辣了，在单位没有人敢惹她。
Zhège nǚrén tài huǒlà le，zài dānwèi méiyǒu rén gǎn rě tā。
This woman is rude and unreasonable. No one in the company dares to offend her.
最近吃了太多辣的东西，该降火了。
Zuìjìn chī le tài duō là de dōngxi，gāi jiànghuǒ le。
I think I should suppress the evil fire in my body, which resulted from my too much eating of hot food in these days.
她喜欢吃四川菜，喜欢那种辣乎乎的感觉。
Tā xǐhuan chī Sìchuāncài，xǐhuan nàzhǒng làhūhū de gǎnjué。
She likes Sichuan dishes and is fond of the peppery taste.
她做菜很喜欢用辣椒油调味。
Tā zuò cài hěnxǐhuan yòng làjiāoyóu tiáowèi。
She likes flavouring dishes with chili oil.
这四川的豆腐丝吃起来都是辣酥酥的！
Zhè Sìchuān de dòufǔsī chī qǐlái dōushì làsūsū de！
The Sichuan shredded tofu tastes a little spicy.
秋天气候太干，不要吃麻辣的食品。
Qiūtiān qìhou tài gān，búyào chī málà de shípǐn。
It is dry in autumn, so hot and spicy food should be avoided.
我认为“酸儿辣女”的说法是一种谬说！
Wǒ rènwéi“suānérlànǚ”de shuōfǎ shì yìzhǒng miùshuō！
It is said that if a pregnant woman likes eating acidic foods, she will give birth to a boy, and peppery foods signifies a girl. But I think it is an absurd statement.
你少吃辣的东西，吃多了容易起青春痘。
Nǐ shǎo chī là de dōngxi，chī duō le róngyì qǐ qīngchūndòu。
You should eat less spicy food, as too much can easily cause acne.
心狠手辣是这伙儿歹徒的一贯特点，我们一定要尽快破案，减少受害者的数量。
Xīnhěn shǒulà shì zhè huǒr dǎitú de yíguàn tèdiǎn，wǒmen yídìng yào jìnkuài pòàn，jiǎnshǎo shòuhàizhě de shùliàng。
Extreme cruelty and lack of mercy have always been these gangsters\' characteristics. We must crack the case as soon as possible so as to reduce the number of sufferers.
烤羊肉时加入一些辣椒面可以提味儿。
Kǎoyángròu shí jiārù yìxiē làjiāomiàn kěyǐ tíwèir。
Put some powdered spices onto the roasted mutton and it will make the mutton taste better.
这群歹徒心黑手辣，什么事都做得出来。
Zhè qún dǎitú xīnhēi shǒulà，shénme shì dōu zuò de chūlái。
These gangsters are cold-blooded and capable of doing anything.
这种牌子的豆腐干有麻辣和孜然两种口味。
Zhèzhǒng páizi de dòufugān yǒu málà hé zīrán liǎngzhǒng kǒuwèi。
Dried bean curd of this brand has two flavors, spice and fennel.

làjiāomiàn
chilli powder

摩擦阻力
mócā zǔlì 
friction drag
Friction is a form of resistance for an object in motion.
摩擦力是一种阻止物体相对运动的阻力。
如果牵引力等于摩擦力，车子将匀速前进。
Rúguǒ qiānyǐnlì děngyú mócālì，chēzi jiāng yúnsù qiánjìn。
If the pulling force is equal to the friction, the car will continue forward at the same speed.
摩擦阻力
mócā zǔlì 
friction drag
Friction is a form of resistance for an object in motion.
摩擦力是一种阻止物体相对运动的阻力。
A perpetual motion machine would have to be frictionless.
Yǒngdòngjī zhǐnéng shì yì zhǒng wú mócālì de jīqì。
永动机只能是一种无摩擦力的机器。
Spikes provide greater traction.
Dīngxié kě tígōng gèng dà de fùzhuó mócālì。
钉鞋可提供更大的附着摩擦力。
轴颈在轴承上摩擦。
Zhóu jǐngzài zhóuchéngshàngmócā。
The journal rubs against the bearing surface.
摩擦生热。
Mócā shēngrè。
Friction generates heat.

摩擦阻力
mócā zǔlì 
friction drag
润滑剂的作用是减轻机器零件之间的摩擦。
Rùnhuájì de zuòyòng shì jiǎnqīng jīqì língjiàn zhījiān de mócā。
The function of lubricant is to abate friction between parts of a machine.
如果牵引力等于摩擦力，车子将匀速前进。
Rúguǒ qiānyǐnlì děngyú mócālì，chēzi jiāng yúnsù qiánjìn。
If the pulling force is equal to the friction, the car will continue forward at the same speed.
两个物体摩擦会生热。
Liǎnggè wùtǐ mócā huì shēng rè.
When two objects are rubbed together they will produce heat.

这个男孩摩擦两根电线来产生火花。

火柴与可燃物摩擦起火，点燃纸捻。

老师用一个不带电的气球与她的同样不带电的头发摩擦。

摩擦力是一种阻止物体相对运动的阻力。
The ball bearings reduce the friction on the joint.
Gǔnzhū kěyǐ jiǎn xiǎo jiéhé chù de mócā。
滚珠可以减小结合处的摩擦。
Artificial grass will tend to give painful friction burns in equivalent situations.

在相同环境下，人造草容易给皮肤造成引起疼痛的摩擦刺激。

The rims of the wheels are burning hot from the friction.
